title: Global Enterprise Account Executive
description:
This is Mevisio
   

  

 Mevisio is a powerful platform designed to elevate operational performance for leaders and teams, driving efficiency through smart visualization and enhanced communication. Our application transforms traditional whiteboards into interactive touch screens, displaying real-time KPIs and activities tailored to each client's needs. Trusted by global companies and digital leaders, Mevisio is deployed in over 3,000 facilities across 60+ countries, with more than half of our revenue coming from international markets.
   

  

 Our customizable platform integrates seamlessly with other systems, supporting clients in diverse industries, particularly manufacturing and healthcare, where Lean principles thrive. By reducing waste and boosting safety and sustainability, Mevisio empowers organizations to achieve operational excellence and improve their overall performance.
   

  

 Why Mevisio?
   

  

 At Mevisio, you'll find a team with high ambitions and a people-first mindset. We thrive in an inclusive, collaborative environment where teamwork and drive go hand in hand. Stepping into our office, you'll meet passionate, kind individuals in a fast-growing SaaS company aiming to transform the manufacturing industry.
   

  

 Guided by our core values—Customer First, People Matter, Better Together, and Aim High—we embrace courage, independence, and our different strengths to achieve our goals while having fun along the way.
   

  

 Check out our career page to get to know us more! ➡️https://careers.mevisio.com
   

  

**What will you do?**
 As a Global Enterprise Account Executive, your focus will lie in expanding sales on our international market. Your mission is to drive sales to new customers in the designated geographical market and manage the entire business process from prospecting to meetings, demonstration, negotiation and agreement and subsequent customer activities. You will run large parts of the business independently and when needed with support from more technical colleagues. Except from all of this, we hope you like the variety of other activities connected to sales, such as webinars, fairs, networks etc.
   

  

 As a Global Enterprise Account Executive at Mevisio, you will have great possibilities to influence, not just yours but also as a company - our future way of working.
   

  

**Your Tasks**
* Market Expansion: Drive sales on the international market.
* Prospecting: Identify and engage potential clients.
* Sales Cycle Management: Handle meetings, demonstrations, negotiations, and closing deals.
* Client Relationships: Build and maintain client relationships for long-term success.
* Collaboration: Work with technical teams to customize solutions.
* Event Participation: Attend webinars, trade shows, and networking events to promote Mevisio.
* Sales Strategy and Reporting: Develop strategies and report on sales activities and forecasts.
* Travels: Be prepared for some travels around the globe, visiting big industries, or a mine, you never know!


**What we think you will bring to us!**
* 5+ Years of Experience: Proven track record in a similar role, preferably within the SaaS or manufacturing industry.
* B2B Sales Expertise: Strong background in business-to-business sales, with a focus on enterprise-level clients.
* SaaS Industry Knowledge: Familiarity with SaaS business models, subscription services, and cloud-based solutions.
* Manufacturing Industry Understanding: Experience or knowledge of the manufacturing sector, Lean methodologies, and operational efficiency.
* Sales Cycle Management: Demonstrated ability to manage the entire sales process, from prospecting to closing.
* Market Expansion: Experience in entering new markets, particularly in the USA, Germany/DACH, or the Nordics.
* Technical Acumen: Ability to understand and explain complex technical solutions, with support from technical teams.
* CRM Proficiency: Experience using CRM tools to track sales activities and pipeline progress.
* Negotiation Skills: Strong negotiation and closing skills with enterprise clients.
* Event Representation: Experience representing companies at trade shows, webinars, and industry events.
* Collaboration: Ability to work cross-functionally with internal teams, including product, marketing, and customer success.


**Who We're Looking For**
 Someone who's all up for the start-up environment! We are building a company together, with high ambitions and a lot of possibilities to make an impact. The market is huge and therefore we have a lot more to do in our journey. Since we are a start-up, nothing is consistent and we need all hands on deck to move forward, structure our processes, ways of working and share knowledge!
   

  

 We need more experience and team-players out there and if you think you would like it here - we hope you want to reach out!
   

  

**Other Perks And Benefits**
 🚆 Centrally located office near public transit
   

  

 🏖️ 30 paid holidays annually
   

  

 💪 Attractive wellness contribution
   

  

 📈 Pension plan
   

  

 🪐 Opportunities for professional development
   

  

 🔕 Flexible working hours and hybrid office setup
   

  

 👟 Access to a nearby gym
   

  

 🎊 Regular social gatherings and team activities
   

  

 💻 Latest tech gear
   

  

 ☕️ Breakfast every day, coffee and tea
   

  

**Sounds exciting? Don't wait for the application!** 
 👇🏻
   

  

*NOTE! We kindly ask all external recruitment firms not to get in touch, due to an internal recruitment process.*
 Mevisio is a powerful platform designed to elevate operational performance for leaders and teams, driving efficiency through smart visualization and enhanced communication. Our application transforms traditional whiteboards into interactive touch screens, displaying real-time KPIs and activities tailored to each client's needs. Trusted by global companies and digital leaders, Mevisio is deployed in over 3,000 facilities across 60+ countries, with more than half of our revenue coming from international markets.
   

  

 Our customizable platform integrates seamlessly with other systems, supporting clients in diverse industries, particularly manufacturing and healthcare, where Lean principles thrive. By reducing waste and boosting safety and sustainability, Mevisio empowers organizations to achieve operational excellence and improve their overall performance.

title: Continuous Improvement Business Analyst, BA EA
description:
**Company**
 About Electrolux AB
   

  

 Ectrolux AB is a Swedish multinational home appliance manufacturer, headquartered in Stockholm
   

  

 Role
   

  

**About**
 About the job and it’s activities
   

  

 Continuous Improvement Europe & APAC at Electrolux – (Stockholm office) Continuous Improvement at Electrolux is one of our top strategic drivers to deliver outstanding consumer experiences. Electrolux launched Continuous Improvement to accelerate overall business improvements and culture change enabled through lean methodologies across the business. The Continuous Improvement Business Analyst is responsible to provide insights to the overall performance of the function, support implementation of various workstreams evolving the framework and help grow employees’ skills in CI by self-sufficiently driving cross-functional workshops.
   

  

 Show More
   

  

 Working hours
   

  

 Monday to Friday, - 9:00 am - 5:00 pm
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 The primary responsibilities for Business Analyst are:
   

  

* Provide insights on functions performance and analyze gaps
* Coordination support to various initiatives within Central CI Team
* Independently run 1-star workshops and A3-thinking workshops with cross-functional teams
* Support CI Manager in developing new topics, evolving the framework of CI


**Candidate Requirements**
 You are independent, confident, have a lot of personal drive as well as ability to work with people at all levels of the organization with strong social skills. Overall, a clear high-potential candidate with a genuine interest in having a career in Electrolux. We expect the right candidate to have Masters degree in engineering / business / economics At least 1-2 years of relevant experience, preferably from consulting company, after university graduation Strong project management skills Ability and willingness to lead presentations / workshops What you will get from the program: Great learning experience and skill-building Gross salary of 28,500 SEK for the first 12 months and the 13th and 14th will be 30,400 SEK vacation days and other company benefits Mobile phone and laptop Visa costs, visa process and relocation support: local registration processes Support in permanent hiring opportunities within Electrolux Group towards the end of the program
   

  

 Show More
   

  

 Eligibility
   

  

* Eligibility criteria you match


 Backgrounds
   

  

 Economics(Required)Business administration(Required)
   

  

**Skills**
 Communication(Required)Project Management(Required)Presentation skills(Required)Facilitation(Required)
   

  

 Languages
   

  

 English(Required)
   

  

 Nationality
   

  

 Any Nationality
   

  

 Minimum study level
   

  

 Masters(Required)

title: Strateg informationssäkerhet till stadsledningskontoret
description:
Stockholm – vår huvudstad med miljoner drömmar, förväntningar och ambitioner. Vi jobbar för alla som lever här idag och i framtiden. Nu söker vi dig som vill tänka stort, nytt och annorlunda med oss – för stockholmarna.
 



  





 Stadsledningskontoret är kommunstyrelsens förvaltning. Vi ansvarar för styrning, uppföljning och utveckling av stadens verksamheter utifrån den vision och budget som kommunfullmäktige har beslutat om. Vi är drygt 300 anställda som i huvudsak arbetar med strategiska frågor som har stor betydelse för stadens verksamheter.
 



  





**Välkommen till oss** 




  





 Stadsledningskontorets avdelning för it och digitalisering ansvarar för att samordna, styra, och leda stadens arbete med informationssäkerhet, it och digitalisering. Avdelningen ska förvalta och utveckla en ändamålsenlig it-miljö samt skapa förutsättningar för morgondagens digitalisering. Vi är idag cirka 60 medarbetare som sitter i fina och ljusa lokaler på Kungsholmen.
 



 På avdelningens enhet Centrala system finns en central funktion för stadsövergripande informationssäkerhet. Funktionens uppdrag och ansvar är att styra, utveckla och följa upp informationssäkerhetsarbetet i staden. Varje nämnd och bolagsstyrelse har det operativa ansvaret för informationssäkerhet inom respektive lokal verksamhet. Alla stadens förvaltningar och bolag, inklusive stadsledningskontoret, har en lokal informationssäkerhetssamordnare och ett lokalt dataskyddsombud.
 



  





**Vi erbjuder** 




  





 Vi erbjuder dig en arbetsplats med kompetenta medarbetare i en prestigelös och engagerande miljö. Det är en attraktiv arbetsplats med goda möjligheter till samverkan med många olika kompetenser och professioner. Vi har ett positivt och öppet klimat och kunniga kollegor med stort driv samt fokus på verksamhetens uppdrag. Vi erbjuder flexibel arbetstid, friskvårdsbidrag samt möjlighet att ibland arbeta hemifrån när arbetet så tillåter. Läs gärna mer om våra förmåner här.
 



  





**Din roll** 




  





 Som strateg inom funktionen för stadsövergripande informationssäkerhet ansvarar du för att på olika sätt hjälpa till att leda och utveckla informationssäkerhetsarbetet inom Stockholms stad.
 



 Vi söker dig som har ett samhällsengagemang och som vill arbeta på en spännande arbetsplats med omväxlande arbetsuppgifter. Du kommer ha stor möjlighet att skapa positiv förändring i hur staden arbetar med informationssäkerhet
 **.** 




  





 I det dagliga arbetet hanterar du en bred palett av arbetsuppgifter, exempelvis:
 



  




* Utveckla och förvalta vår styrning och uppföljning av GDPR
* Samordna och utveckla funktionens arbete inom ramen för stadens övergripande styrnings- och uppföljningsprocesser
* Samordna och utveckla funktionens arbete med internkontroll
* Vara sammanhållande för utbildnings- och kommunikationsfrågor inom ansvarsområdet
* Bidra till ökad riskmedvetenhet och identifiering av sårbarheter genom kontinuerlig dialog med lokala informationssäkerhetssamordnare hos stadens förvaltningar och bolag
* Ge praktisk och situationsanpassad rådgivning till stadens förvaltningar och bolag
* Stötta vid revisioner, granskningar eller inspektioner



  





 Gemensamt för alla roller på stadsledningskontoret är att vi arbetar både styrande och stöttande.
 



  





**Din kompetens och erfarenhet** 




  





 För att lyckas i tjänsten behöver du ha följande kvalifikationer:
 


* Högskole- eller universitetsutbildning som arbetsgivaren bedömer relevant för tjänsten
* Minst 3 års dokumenterad erfarenhet av arbete med informationssäkerhet
* Erfarenhet och teoretiska kunskaper om dataskyddsförordningen (GDPR)
* God förmåga att obehindrat kommunicera målgruppsanpassat på svenska i tal och skrift.



  





 Det är meriterande om du har:
 



  




* Arbetat i eller för Stockholms stad i en roll som skapat förståelse för stadens storlek och komplexitet
* Arbetslivserfarenhet från it-revision eller internkontroll
* Certifiering inom informationssäkerhet
* Projektledarerfarenhet
* Kunskaper i offentlighets- och sekretesslagen



  





 Vi söker dig som är lyhörd och intresserad av andra människor och som har förmågan att sätta dig in i andras verkligheter då arbetet innebär många kontaktytor.
 



  





 Du har lätt för att lära nytt och har ett strukturerat arbetssätt där du förstår vikten av att vara noga, självgående och visa gott omdöme. Du tar stort eget ansvar för att arbeta effektivt och leverera kvalitet på utsatt tid. För att lyckas med våra uppdrag och för att möta alla stadens olika målgrupper måste du kunna uttrycka dig kärnfullt, lättbegripligt och målgruppsanpassat, både i tal och skrift. Vi söker dig som både är bra på, och genuint intresserad av, att bena ut och hitta kärnan i en till synes komplex information, samt hur du kan förmedla det vidare till andra på ett begripligt och kärnfullt sätt. Du når dina slutsatser och förslag genom väl underbyggd analys men du är också beredd att släppa fram andras idéer, väga in dem och tänka om.
 



  





 Vi är en politiskt styrd verksamhet där projekt och processer kan ha långa ledtider och då är det viktigt att du förblir motiverad, uthållig och effektiv.
 



  





**Din ansökan utan det personliga brevet** 




  





 För att stärka fokus på de kompetenser och erfarenheter som efterfrågas för denna roll rekryterar vi utan det personliga brevet. Vid bedömningen av din ansökan kommer vi endast att utgå ifrån ditt CV och ett antal frågor du får besvara i samband med att du söker tjänsten. Vi önskar att du svarar konkret och kortfattat på frågorna, och att det finns en tydlig koppling mellan dina svar och ditt CV.
 



  





**Övrigt** 




  





 Arbetspsykologiska tester kan komma att användas.
 



  





 Stockholms stad arbetar med kompetensbaserad rekrytering som syftar till att se till varje persons kompetens och därmed motverka diskriminering.
 



 Anställningsform: tillsvidareanställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 100% | Ort: Stockholm | Län: Stockholms län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: 2025/395 | Kontakt: Carla Adriasola, rekryteringskonsult 08-50811713, Maria Nielsen, chef 08-50829514, | Facklig företrädare: Katina Staf, Vision 08-50829192, Andreas Meschke, SACO 08-50829589, Karin Wrannvik, Ledarna 076-1290750, | Publicerat: 2025-01-23 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-02-06

title: Engineering Manager
description:
*Global migration is a 21st-century reality: Whether people are fleeing from something or racing towards better opportunity, finding love, or looking to experience new cultures, people are now living side by side in a new way. At Rebtel, we believe in tearing down borders – from the geographical borders that complicate international communication and money transfers to the cultural borders that keep people divided. We’re on a mission to build products serving the 2 billion modern internationals of the world. We offer work, communication, and remittance services for anyone that has crossed a border:*
*Our team mirrors our global audience: we are a diverse team of :50 people from 27 different countries that get together everyday – and we’d love for you to join us. Do you have what it takes?*
**Rebtel is looking for an Engineering Manager**
**About Rebtel's Development Teams**
 Our users know us for our best-in-class calling, smooth money transfer and best-value topup services. These services are powered by our core systems that are engineered to deliver processing efficiency. You will be the engineering manager for the team that builds and maintains these core services.
   

  

 Our mobile apps have more than 10M downloads across App Store and Play Store, and our website is visited by millions of users. Our core services easily support these kinds of loads given the considerations that have gone into load balancing, distributed processing and high availability. The core engineering team builds for scale and for a global audience, making ours a setup that offers exciting challenges and a chance to work with cutting edge technologies.
   

  

 The engineering manager’s responsibility, in a nutshell, is to ensure that we have the right people, working on the right things, using the right tools and processes. The core team is cross-functional - you will have mobile developers, .Net developers and Web developers working with you.
   

  

**About You And Your Responsibilities**
* Provide leadership of the core engineering team on a daily basis
* Align the frontend strategy with the interim and long-term visions of Rebtel
* Interface with the product team to translate product needs into deliverables from the Frontend team
* Help us to retain, develop and attract top engineering talent
* You have keen interest in architecture: how to build complex applications that are maintainable.
* As an engineering manager your role will include having an overview of architectural decisions. You will discuss technical solutions with the rest of the team and institute measures to keep the code base clean.
* You are interested in problem solving and enjoy finding the simplest possible solution to complex problems.


**Requirements**
* Experience building and leading software development teams
* Sound knowledge in Agile development methodologies
* Experience with Development lifecycle tools and processes (Github, Jira, Confluence)
* Experience in a high-volume environment or product with millions of users.
* Ability to adapt and respond to rapidly evolving product needs
* Excellent interpersonal and communication skills. We work in English, but you will be able to have conversations in 20+ languages


**Bonus points**
* You have developer experience with one of backend, full-stack, Mobile or Web but have a solid understanding of the other areas.
* Experience working with large teams on mature products with many users
* Experience building new products with an eye on maintainability and scalability
* Experience in one of the sectors in which we work i.e payment platforms, FinTech, telecoms or money transfer
* You can bake, ski, play a musical instrument or spend > 2 hours in a Friday afterwork


**What's in it for you?**
* A chance to leave your mark on one of few global products out of Stockholm
* Work with cool new shiny tech
* A chance to work with a fun and very diverse team


*We are Rebtel. People from all around the world, as of now 27 countries and more to come. We believe in equal opportunity and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.*

title: Timvikarier inom bland annat skola och fritids (grundskolan), Skarpatorpsskolan
description:
* Jobba i Stockholms stad
* Lediga jobb
* Timvikarier inom bland annat skola och fritids (grundskolan), Skarpatorpsskolan


 Timvikarier inom bland annat skola och fritids (grundskolan), Skarpatorpsskolan
   

  

 Publicerad: 2025-01-23
   

  

 Referensnummer: 2025/402
   

  

 Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-02-06
   

  

 Anställningsform: Visstidsanställning (kortare än 3 månader)
   

  

 Anställningens omfattning: Heltid/Deltid (100%)
   

  

 Tillträde: enligt överenskommelse
   

  

 Ort: Stockholm
   

  

 Visa alla lediga jobb
   

  

 Stockholm – vår huvudstad med miljoner drömmar, förväntningar och ambitioner. Vi jobbar för alla som lever här idag och i framtiden. Nu söker vi dig som vill tänka stort, nytt och annorlunda med oss – för stockholmarna.
   

  

 Välkommen till oss
   

  

 Vi söker dig som vill arbeta inom tjänster på Skarpatorpsskolan som vikarie i tidsbegränsad anställning inom skola och fritids inom grundskolan. Skarpatorpsskolan ligger i stadsdelen Skarpnäck och har sammanlagt ca 560 elever och 100 medarbetare. Skarpnäck är byggt på 1980-talet och består mestadels av flerbostadshus och radhus. Skolan ligger mitt i området och har nära till naturen. Skarpatorpsskolan ligger nära intill tunnelbanestationen Skarpnäck och har flera busslinjer från olika delar i Stockholm. Det är enkelt att ta sig till skolan.
   

  

 Vi erbjuder
   

  

 Skarpatorpsskolan är inne i en spännande fas av utvecklingsarbete för att skapa gemensam samsyn för alla skolans delar. Vi vill särskilt värna om elevers rätt till god utbildning i skolan och en meningsfull fritidsverksamhet för eleverna. Vi har genom läromedelssatsning nyligen kunnat köpa in nytt material för elevernas utbildning inom vår skola, men även digitala arbetssätt internt inom arbetet utvecklas just nu i rask takt. Du kommer få delta i en utvecklingsresa tillsammans med oss och få möjlighet att vara en del i vårt arbete på den vägen. Tjänster till vikariaten vi söker är för kort och längre tid vid personals frånvaro.
   

  

 Din roll
   

  

 Vi har intentionen att försöka se hela verksamheten som en skola inom Skarpatorpsskolan och tror på att tillsammans skapar vi stabilitet, trygghet och lugn som behövs för elevers utvecklingsbehov i skola och på fritids. Du ska i din roll vara en del av det arbetet. Arbetsuppgifterna är varierande och omväxlande under arbetsdagen.
   

  

 Din kompetens och erfarenhet
   

  

 Vi söker flera tjänster för timvikariat inom skola, administration, vaktmästeri och it.
   

  

 Det är meriterande om du har tidigare kompetens och erfarenhet av arbete inom skola och fritids med elever. Varmt välkommen med din ansökan där du beskriver dig själv och dina styrkor för att arbeta tillsammans med oss i ditt CV.
   

  

 Stockholms stad arbetar med kompetensbaserad rekrytering som syftar till att se till varje persons kompetens och därmed motverka diskriminering.

title: Senior Account Executive - Nordics
description:
**Job Description**
**Senior Account Executive for Nordics region**
 As a Senior Account Executive, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining solid relationships with key clients, creating and executing strategic account plans, and driving revenue growth. You will have the opportunity to work with a dynamic and experienced team and will play a key role in accelerating the company's growth ambitions. Reporting directly to the Chief Sales Officer, you will play a pivotal part in driving the growth of our company.
   

  

 The ideal candidate for this role will have a proven track record of success in a senior sales role, a deep understanding of the industry(es), and strong communication and negotiation skills. We want to hear from you if you are passionate about delivering results and thrive in a fast-paced, high-growth environment.
   

  

 Certified as a Great Place to Work for the third consecutive year, we are proud to foster a diverse, inclusive workplace that promotes creativity, collaboration, and open communication.
   

  

 Our commitment to work-life balance means that we support flexible working arrangements and prioritize the well-being of our employees. Above all, we strive to create an environment where everyone feels empowered to make a difference and contribute to our success. Neptune Software boasts of a highly collaborative and empathetic team, driven by a shared passion for our company and the work we do. Don't just take our word for it - check out the employee testimonials featured on our Culture page on the website.
   

  

 We offer a competitive salary package, a supportive, flexible, and collaborative working environment, and the opportunity to work with some of the biggest names in the business.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Develop effective and specific account plans to ensure revenue target delivery and sustainable growth.
* Develop and maintain relationships with key decision makers at potential and existing customers.
* Identify and pursue new business opportunities.
* Meet or exceed sales goals and targets.
* Build and maintain a deep understanding of the market and our products.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure customer satisfaction.
* Develop relationships with new and existing customers and leverage these to drive sales.
* Build a foundation on which to harvest future business opportunities.
* Actively understand each customer's technology footprint, strategic growth plans, technology strategy, and competitive landscape.
* Play an active role in personally nurturing and developing large/key customers and enabling the business to grow and capture market share.
* Be a brand champion and educate prospective clients on Neptune’s value proposition.
* Work with our Marketing, Pre-Sales, and Business Development teams to create an effective lead generation, pipeline development, and revenue generation approach.


**What We Offer**
* A highly competitive compensation package with uncapped commission potential.
* Our comprehensive benefits package includes health insurance, a competitive pension plan, and paid time off.
* Career advancement opportunities.
* Positive and supportive company culture: Our company culture is rooted in Norwegian values of positivity, supportiveness, and fun, creating a work environment that is both productive and enjoyable.
* International growth company with a diverse workforce: You will have the opportunity to work alongside a diverse group of 100+ individuals from 34 different nationalities in an international growth company that is expanding rapidly.
* Trust-based work environment: We foster a trust-based work environment where you can take ownership of your work and have the autonomy to make decisions that contribute to our collective success.


**Requirements**
* 8-10+ years of experience in sales of complex business software/IT solutions.
* Experience selling complex software solutions to C-level executives.
* Strong communication and negotiation skills.
* Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
* Preferably knowledge of the SAP eco-system.
* Demonstrated success in exceeding sales targets using a consultative, solutions-focused approach.
* Speak any Nordic language, with excellent proficiency in English.
* Consistent self-motivation and drive – a self-starter attitude, with a relentless drive to succeed.
* Ability to work in a fast-paced, entrepreneurial and collaborative environment where we all work towards a common goal.


**The Product And The Company**
 Neptune Software is a leading low code/no code (LCNC) application development platform that revolutionizes application development and helps organizations digitize their operations. The Neptune LCNC platform enables organizations to seamlessly build state-of-the-art business applications that integrate into their existing IT landscape, including unparalleled SAP ERP inside-out integration capabilities. With Neptune, organizations can create apps that span a wide range of use cases, from point solutions in areas such as HR, maintenance, logistics, and supply chain management to integrated portals for employees, customers, and suppliers.
   

  

 The platform provides an extremely fast time to market at a much lower cost and better integration and customization than any other player in the industry. Neptune already has a strong international position in the market, with both mid-sized and large corporations as customers.
   

  

 Our industry-wide accolades include multiple G2 Leader Awards in Digital Experience Platforms, Rapid Application Development, and Low-Code Development Platforms. Additionally, we have received several recognitions as a Strong Performer from Gartner Peer Insights and in the Gartner Magic Quadrant.
   

  

 Neptune Software is headquartered in Oslo, with a secondary office in Hamburg, Germany. The rest of our employees work remotely from six other countries.
   

  

 Neptune Software was acquired by Private Equity firm Triton Partners in 2022 and embarked on an accelerated expansion.

title: Sales Director
company_industry: Software Development and Airlines and Aviation
description:
We at Avinode are looking for a committed and enthusiastic
 **Sales Director** 
 . In this role, you will report to the Chief Revenue Officer (CRO) and will play a critical role in developing and implementing sales strategies to acquire new customers and grow revenue. You will lead a sales team of two Team Leaders, Account Managers and Account Executives located in Gothenburg, Europe and in the US. Your assignment is to identify sales and revenue expansion opportunities and transform them into actionable strategies and plans while partnering with cross-functional teams to optimize member segmentation, account targeting, routes to market, and ultimately achieve sales and revenue targets.
 



 You will be a part of a warm, inclusive, and supportive workplace where a bit of quirky humor is always welcome. Are you up for this exciting challenge?
 



 Possible placements for this position are Gothenburg (Headquarter for Avinode), with the ability to travel frequently, or Stockholm with the ability to travel + visit the Gothenburg office very regularly.
 



  





**What you will do** 




  





 As our
 **Sales Director** 
 , you will develop and implement comprehensive member acquisition strategies that align with the company’s objectives and target markets. This includes identifying the most effective channels, tactics, and messaging to reach and engage potential customers. You will leverage data and analytics to track, measure, and analyze member acquisition and revenue expansion efforts’ effectiveness. Use data-driven insights to inform decision-making, optimize campaigns, and continuously improve performance. You will work closely with RevOps and Finance in process optimization, including designing and implementing efficient methodologies, forecasting, and reporting. Partnering with product and product marketing will also be essential to gain a comprehensive understanding of product offerings and revenue objectives. Subsequently, develop and execute plans to maximize sales and revenue growth opportunities. In this role, you will also own the Sales Incentive Compensation planning and design process. Align quotas with segments, determine over-assigns, and compare historical to advise on planned growth.
 



  





**What you will bring along** 




  





 We expect you to have 10+ years of combined Sales experience, including 5+ years of experience managing sales teams in an Enterprise
 **SaaS company** 
 . You are a passionate leader who loves to mentor teams for consistency. You will bring excellent organizational, prioritization, and project management skills and be adept at driving results and sustainable growth. You are metrics-oriented with strong pipeline management.
 



  




* Exceptional communication and active listening skills to discern member needs and address objections effectively.
* Driven, hard-working with high standards for self and others; have a positive mindset, from integrity to reliability to general kindness toward people.
* A natural leader that is an ambassador for Avinode in every aspect - from meetings with C-level to being on stage talking about our thought leadership within the Aviation industry.
* Deep understanding of International sales & working in a international environment.
* Able to travel domestically and internationally 30% of the time. Approximately outside of Europe once every other month.



  





**What do we offer?** 




  





 We are proud to offer you a workplace where we have high engagement and where creativity and curiosity are always much appreciated. Your ideas will be heard.
 


* A central position in a healthy, stable and growing market leading company
* The opportunity to have an strong influence on our sales organization and its design
* Competitive salary and benefits
* Synergy events are where all Noders meet each other to collaborate on a professional level and have fun, which is equally important.



  





 Did this add just make your heart skip a beat? We can’t wait for your application!
 



  





*In this recruitment we work with SalesOnly's Senior recruitment consultant Kristin Axelsson. Please apply for this position as soon as possible through the “apply” button with your CV and cover letter in English. Please note that selections will be running continuously, so don’t wait to apply! All applications and contacts are treated confidentially. SalesOnly is no longer allowed to receive or handle applications that are received by mail as this violates the directives of GDPR.* 




  





**About Avinode Group** 




  





 Avinode Group offers a fully connected suite of essential B2B software to enable Business Aviation professionals through the entire workflow of managing, sourcing, and booking aircraft. Founded in the heart of Sweden in 2002, we support around 2,000 companies globally.
 



  





 Our essential tools are designed to minimize stress and maximize profit for brokers and operators. The suite includes the world’s leading sourcing platform for air charter, making it easy to find aircraft, book trips, and market aircraft globally. Air charter operators and flight departments are provided with a fully cloud-based fleet management system to make flight operations smoother. Our customers can rely on a hassle-free process from quoting to booking and paying with a fully integrated payment solution.
 



  





 With 150+ Noders spread between Sweden and the US, our flexible and collaborative culture empowers everyone to come forward with new ideas, try them out, make some mistakes, and initiate dialogue. Avinode Group seeks candidates who thrive on exciting assignments and can collaboratively work alongside other intelligent, humorous, and dedicated co-workers. Our roots are firmly planted in our core values, which inspire us daily to exceed expectations.
 



  





 Avinode Group is owned by CAMP Systems, which is the leading provider of aircraft compliance and health management services to the global business aviation industry. We are an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, national origin, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or veteran status. Want more details? Discover the value our essentials bring to our customers every day https://avinodegroup.com/

title: Account Executive - New Business
description:
**Juni who? 👋**
 At Juni, we’re busy building the future of banking. We want to help businesses do more with less and get access to the financial tools they need to operate, grow, and win globally.
   

  

**How & Why We Do It 🚀**
 We give our people the same thing we’re building for our customers: freedom. Freedom to be 100% yourself. Freedom to explore your potential and what’s more – make the most of it. We truly believe we’re making the world a better place for online businesses, and we want you to be a part of that mission.
   

  

**Your role 🙋**
 We are seeking a strong Account Executive Sales Rep to join our team! You will establish a strong customer base for Juni within our Swedish market. Working closely with key stakeholders across the company, you will be responsible for establishing a strong sales pipeline through multi-threaded outbound tactics. This is a full-lifecycle prospecting-heavy, hands-on position in a company expecting to go through fast growth in a fast-growing market.
   

  

**Your Responsibilities 💪**
 In this role you’ll:
   

  

* Establish a new client base for Juni, building your sales pipeline through cold outbound prospecting.
* Work closely with our sales team lead and peers and other key stakeholders to build the sales funnel.
* Proactively develop and create leads by leveraging personal and professional networks, as well as our tools for data and insights.
* Present the Juni product and technology to potential clients.
* Meet or exceed monthly and quarterly sales targets.
* Proactively identify sales pipeline risks and develop mitigation plans.
* Serve as a voice of the customer of all challenges/opportunities that exist within their areas.
* Ensure compliance in our sales process.


 In 2 months, you’ll complete Juni’s onboarding, learn to sell to finance leaders, and fully integrate into your role. By 3 months, you'll be sourcing leads, refining outreach strategies, qualifying top deals, and improving team productivity. At 5 months, you'll have closed your first 20 customers, optimized sales processes, and be set to exceed your targets consistently.
   

  

**Your Qualifications 👨‍🎓**
 What we need to see:
   

  

* 1+ years of experience as an outbound focused full lifecycle BDR, AE or similar
* Comfortable selling to SME-mid-market sied customers
* Strong & creative negotiation skills
* Critical thinker and extremely data-driven
* Excellent communication skills in native Swedish and, of course, English


 What we’d love to see:
   

  

* Experience with B2B sales tech stack; Hubspot, LI Sales Nav, Cognism
* Experience with SaaS or B2B fintech (Banking, spend management, treasury or financing)


**Your tool stack 💻**
 Mac. Chrome. Even… Windows. Choose the hardware that helps you work best. We’ll also support whatever software you need. From Miro to Slack and everything in between.
   

  

**Your people 👥**
 Our team is as ambitious as our amazing customers. We aim high and we move with speed to make our vision a reality. We care deeply about building a better future for our customers and each other. Here, you can work with people at the top of their game and who didn’t get there by playing games. You can help us create a whole new category in financial services.
   

  

**Your Benefits 😍**
 We’re freedom-first. Transparent. Caring. Empowering. So our benefits are too.
   

  

* We work hybrid. We'll see you in one of our offices in Stockholm or Gothenburg at least two days per week.
* Swap 2D for 3D. Meet all Junis IRL at the company onsite each year.
* Diversity is at our core. We're part Swedish. Part Canadian. Part French. Part Indian. Part Italian. Part British. Part Portuguese. You get the idea.
* Great players can stay great players. Progress your career whether you choose to manage people or not.
* Stock options. We can’t promise you’ll make a fortune. But we’ll give it our very best shot.
* Vacation days. 30 days, awesome!
* Private Health insurance. You know. Just in case.


 At Juni, we’re building the future of banking. We want to help businesses do more with less and get access to the financial tools they need to operate, grow, and win globally.

title: B2B-Säljare | Telemarketing
description:
*Nu startar vi upp nytt sälj-team som ska förvalta ett samarbete med ett av Sveriges mest välkända bolag. Vår samarbetspartner arbetar med digitala tjänster inom kredit- och marknadsinformation, och dina kunder är främst chefer inom ekonomi, marknadsföring och försäljning 🚀*
**VAD INNEBÄR DIN ROLL?**
 I rollen som Junior Account Manager kommer du ha ditt fokus på att identifiera affärsmöjligheter och driva nyförsäljning. Du ansvarar även för den affärsmässiga relationen med kunderna i din kundportfölj vilken är en mix av små och medelstora kunder.
   

  

**VEM ÄR DU?**
 Vi ser att du tidigare arbetat i en roll med stort kundfokus och har erfarenhet inom B2B försäljning. Du har en drivkraft som få andra och vill ta ditt nästa steg inom försäljning.
   

  

**Förutsättningar**
* Du har erfarenhet av att driva hela säljprocessen
* Erfarenhet inom B2B-försäljning
* Arbetat med att bygga upp egen kundportfölj
* Du behärskar svenska och engelska flytande i både tal och skrift.


**VAD ERBJUDER VI?**
 Fast lön + Provision.
   

  

 Heltidstjänst: Mån - Fre kl. 08-17.
   

  

 Möjlighet till personlig och professionell utveckling genom olika utbildningar.
   

  

 Karriärmöjligheter inom företaget.
   

  

**IMPRESSIVE RELATIONS**
 Vi är ett etablerat Sälj- och Bemanningsföretag, grundat 2012. Vi arbetar idag med flera stora aktörer över hela Norden, inom branscher som Bank & Finans, IT och Solenergi.
   

  

 Impressive Relations ser starkt på personlig utveckling och erbjuder kontinuerliga utbildningar inom försäljning. Vi ger våra medarbetare möjligheten att växa inom företaget oavsett tidigare erfarenhet.
   

  

 Vi jobbar alltid i starka team och skapar roliga arbetsdagar tillsammans.
   

  

**Impressive Relations utmärker sig på marknaden genom att göra ett bra jobb med goda resultat.** 
 Vi tror på en stadig tillväxt och pålitliga relationer som nyckeln till framgång. De affärsområden vi arbetar inom - Event, Bemanning och Försäljning - ger våra medarbetare en trygg grund med olika valmöjligheter inom företaget.
   

  

***Välkommen med din ansökan!***
*Vi genomför löpande urval och kan tillsätta tjänsten innan sista ansökningsdag. Tveka därför inte, skicka in din ansökan redan idag!*
 Felicia Rullander
 *|* 
 Head of Recruitment
   

  

*076 425 35 70 | felicia.rullander@impressiverelations.se*

title: Senior Account Executive
company_industry: Software Development and IT System Custom Software Development
description:
**About the role** 




 Tacton is seeking a Senior Account Executive to join our EMEA Sales team. In this role, you will work closely with our commercial team, Sales Engineering, Professional Services, Customer Success, and Marketing to develop and execute strategic account plans that drive significant software deals and bring them to closure.
 



  





 As a Senior Account Executive, you will serve as a strategic advisor to our customers, engaging with multiple executive stakeholders across business and IT functions. You will lead the discovery process, strategy, and value mapping to analyze the customer’s business needs and position the best solutions to achieve the desired outcomes.
 



  





**What you will do** 



* **Build Qualified Sales Pipelines:** 
 Identify and cultivate prospective clients to develop a robust sales pipeline.
* **Drive Value-Based Sales:** 
 Focus on winning new, strategic key accounts using a value-based sales approach.
* **Execute Sales Strategy:** 
 Align your efforts with key metrics in the EMEA Sales strategy to drive results.
* **Salesforce Management:** 
 Keep Salesforce updated and manage forecasts effectively.
* **Implement Sales Metrics:** 
 Develop and implement systems to measure sales performance.
* **Achieve Sales Objectives:** 
 Consistently meet and exceed sales targets.
* **Negotiate Contracts:** 
 Lead negotiations for commercial and legal contracts to close new deals.
* **Lead Discovery Process:** 
 Drive the discovery process to uncover customer needs and opportunities.
* **Create Customer Presentations:** 
 Develop and present tailored solutions to qualify use cases and advance the sales process.



  





**Requirements** 



* At least 7+ Years of experience in technology software solutions for global enterprise accounts, preferably within a CPQ environment.
* Bachelor's degree in a relevant field or equal.
* Fluency in English, both written and spoken.
* Business knowledge and experience in building and managing professional services business, ideally within B2B SaaS software, technology, or the manufacturing industry.



  





**Who you are** 



* **Curios**
* You possess the intelligence and curiosity to continuously learn and adapt, especially in complex fields like CPQ.
* **Coachable**
* You're open to relearning and improving, especially in transitioning from feature-function-oriented, IT-driven sales to creating a much better buyer experience.
* **Willing to Do the Work**
* You're proactive in building your pipeline and actively pursuing opportunities.
* **Skilled Storyteller**
* You can effectively communicate with sales leaders and product teams, tailoring your message to resonate with different audiences.
* **Situational Awareness**
* You can read a room, identify key supporters, and understand the dynamics at play.
* **100% Transparency**
* You believe in complete honesty and openness in all interactions.



  





**The recruitment process consists of:** 



* First screening call with global talent acquisition
* Business interview with our hiring manager
* Personality test and logical ability test
* Cultural and background interview with global talent acquisition
* Interview with CCO and internal partner
* Reference check



  





**What we offer** 




 At Tacton you will get the chance to develop your career in an organization that values teamwork and promotes individual growth. We offer a global and open environment working with the latest technology to solve important and complex problems in the manufacturing industry. We offer flexible working conditions, and our teamwork is based on knowledge sharing and professional respect.
 



  





**Our work culture and why you belong.** 




 Collaborative, Engaged, Trustworthy, Customer-Oriented, and Visionary. Do any of these value words resonate with you? If so, we would love to hear more.
 



  





 Our culture is so much more than words on a poster, we are all dedicated to making Tacton a great place to work. We may describe our culture as “casual” with little hierarchy, and no “big egos”. We value effort and celebrate successes. We treat each other kindly and we politely disagree with no hard feelings.
 



  





 You may find that Tactonites come from many different parts of the world, with many different stories and experiences. And we think that this diversity is part of what makes us great!
 



 We are proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer committed to providing an environment that champions diversity. The more inclusive we are, the stronger we become.
 



 As a Tactonite you will be welcomed with open arms (even virtually), and we have a comprehensive onboarding program that lets you get up to speed on everything Tacton does. We look forward to receiving your application. We encourage you to apply as soon as possible as we consider applications on a rolling basis.
 



  





**About Tacton** 




*Tacton is a leading Software as a Service company trusted by global manufacturers. We got started in the late 1990’s when six computer scientists figured out a revolutionary way to help Manufacturers overcome their most business-critical, product configuration challenges. Since those early days, we have grown to support global manufacturers seeking to thrive in a changing world.* 




*We invite you to find out more about us @ www.tacton.com/about*

title: Sales Trader Nordics
job_function: Sales, Business Development, and General Business
company_industry: Services for Renewable Energy and Business Consulting and Services
description:
**Sales Trader Nordics** 




  





**The Candidate** 




  





 You are passionate about climate change and how to tackle this global issue one trade at a time. We are looking for an enthusiastic and committed team player that fosters superior performance by utilizing their competences in deal making. You have an affinity with commodities and finance, are self-motivated and eager to develop your commercial skills and work in a close nit team. The ideal candidate should be confident, but open to direct feedback and preferably have a comprehensive understanding of Environmental Commodities (carbon, (bio)fuels, (renewable) power or gas markets). You excel in understanding your clients’ needs and transforming these into actions. We are looking for someone to develop themselves and grow with the company to become a key team player.
 



  





**The Company** 




  





 Caely Renewables (Caely) is a solution-driven company committed to tackling climate change—the defining challenge of our era. We combine expert advisory with hands-on execution to support conterparties in environmental commodity transactions, including carbon credits, biofuels, and renewable energy certificates. Our skilled, dynamic team partners with counterparties to not only meet but exceed carbon reduction targets. Headquartered in Amsterdam, Caely is expanding rapidly across Europe and North America, with local offices in Genoa, Houston, and Stockholm to advance the global transition toward a sustainable future.
 



  





**The Role** 




  





 The sales trader has to develop mid and senior-level relationships with top-class companies (utilities, project developers, corporates, generators and industrials) and actively close transactions that meet the clients and Caely demands. The teams, including your personal, performance is measured with an annual ambitious sales plan.
 



 The ambition is to grow as an individual and as a company in this exciting and rapidly growing market. You will be responsible for trading products such as carbon offsets (voluntary and obligatory), renewable power and gas certificates, energy efficiency certificates, transport quota’s, amongst others. We help our clients reduce their environmental (future risk) positions, maximize their output while utilizing and building our network. You will have full support directly from the management team and future colleagues.
 



  





 The role will consist of, but not limited to, the following actions on a daily basis:
 


* Communicate daily with your teams’ customers and needs
* Actively approach new customers to build the customer database
* Conduct local market research on the environmental commodities market and contribute to the company's growth efforts
* Creating new commodity deal structures meeting Caely and your clients’ needs
* Collaborate with the team and peers to structure deals for the benefit of the customer and Caely



  





**The Requirements** 




  





 In order to be considered for the role you will meet the following:
 


* Fluent in Swedish/Norwegian/Danish/Finnish speaker and English
* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in business, finance, economics or equivalent
* 1-5 year’s experience in commodities trading, brokering, business development
* Self-starter, motivated and eager to develop your skills and become a knowledge leader in the environmental commodity industry
* Articulate, precise and excellent communication skills (giving and receiving feedback)
* Climate Advocate and have a drive to leave the world in a better place

title: Senior Development Business Analyst-M3 User Experience (Linköping, Gothenburg or Stockholm based)
description:
Are you passionate about improving how businesses work and creating user-friendly solutions that make a real difference? Do you enjoy collaborating with others and bringing fresh ideas to the table? If so, this could be the perfect role for you!
   

  

 A Typical Day in This Role
   

  

 As part of our team, you’ll:
   

 \* Shape Great Experiences: Work closely with colleagues and customers to understand what they need and help design solutions that work seamlessly.
   

 \* Support Growth & Improvement: Test new ideas, solve problems, and document your progress to ensure everything runs smoothly.
   

 \* Write and Test: Create user-friendly documentation to help others understand our solutions and conduct thorough tests to ensure they work perfectly.
   

 \* Be a Problem-Solver: Help identify and fix issues, ensuring our solutions are as effective as possible.
   

 \* Collaborate Across Borders: Connect with team members in Sweden, Poland, and Manila, as well as customers and partners around the world.
   

 \* Learn & Share Knowledge: Stay curious, explore new ideas, and help the team grow stronger together.
   

 \* Showcase Solutions: Share the exciting work you’re doing through engaging presentations and webinars.
   

  

 What We’re Looking For
   

  

 We’re looking for someone who:
   

 \* Has Experience: You’ve worked with M3 for at least 5 years, either as a consultant or within a company that uses it.
   

 \* Cares About Users: You’re passionate about creating easy-to-use solutions.
   

 \* Knows the Tools: You’re familiar with features like custom lists and search tools within M3.
   

  

 What Would Be Great to Have
   

  

 While not required, we’d love it if you also:
   

 \* Love Creative Problem-Solving: Have experience tailoring solutions to meet unique customer needs.
   

 \* Enjoy Exploring Tools: Have worked with tools that help build or personalize user experiences.
   

  

 -------------------------
   

  

 Why You’ll Love Working With Us
   

  

 ✨ Flexibility: Enjoy a hybrid work environment with a balance of office and remote work.
   

 🌍 Global Collaboration: Be part of a team that connects and works across different countries and cultures.
   

 📚 Continuous Growth: Expand your skills and knowledge in an environment that values learning.
   

 🎤 Share Your Impact: Present your ideas and projects in webinars, showcasing your creativity and expertise.
   

  

 Let’s Build the Future Together
   

  

 If you’re ready to take on exciting challenges and make a difference, we’d love to hear from you. Apply today and join our innovative team!
   

  

 About Infor
   

  

 Infor is a global leader in business cloud software products for companies in industry specific markets. Infor builds complete industry suites in the cloud and efficiently deploys technology that puts the user experience first, leverages data science, and integrates easily into existing systems. Over 60,000 organizations worldwide rely on Infor to help overcome market disruptions and achieve business-wide digital transformation.
   

 For more information visit www.infor.com
   

  

 Our Values
   

  

 At Infor, we strive for an environment that is founded on a business philosophy called [1] Principle Based Management™ (PBM™) and eight Guiding Principles: integrity, stewardship & compliance, transformation, principled entrepreneurship, knowledge, humility, respect, self-actualization. Increasing diversity is important to reflect our markets, customers, partners, and communities we serve in now and in the future.
   

  

 We have a relentless commitment to a culture based on PBM. Informed by the principles that allow a free and open society to flourish, PBM™ prepares individuals to innovate, improve, and transform while fostering a healthy, growing organization that creates long-term value for its clients and supporters and fulfillment for its employees.
   

  

 Infor is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive work environment. Infor does not discriminate against candidates or employees because of their sex, race, gender identity, disability, age, sexual orientation, religion, national origin, veteran status, or any other protected status under the law. If you require accommodation or assistance at any time during the application or selection processes, please submit a request by following the directions located in the FAQ section at the bottom of the infor.com/about/careers webpage.
   

  

 At Infor we value your privacy that’s why we created a policy that you can read [2] here.
   

  

  

 References
   

  

 Visible links
   

 1. https://www.kochind.com/about/business-philosophy
   

 2. https://www.infor.com/about/privacy

title: Internrevisor
description:
Om tjänsten
   

  

 Group Internal Audit är en oberoende och objektiv funktion som utvärderar, föreslår och följer upp förbättringar avseende effektiviteten i Vattenfalls riskhantering, interna kontroller samt styrprocesser inom hela koncernen. Group Internal Audit genomför internrevisioner och utredningar i syfte att förbättra och tillföra värde till Vattenfalls verksamhet. Avdelningen hjälper Vattenfall att uppnå sina mål genom att tillämpa ett systematiskt tillvägagångssätt för att utvärdera och ge råd till förbättringar. Group Internal Audit rapporterar observationer och rekommendationer till verksamhetsledningen, koncernledningen och styrelsens revisionskommitté.
   

  

**Dina ansvarsområden:**
 Dina huvudsakliga uppgifter som Internrevisor kommer att vara att genomföra internrevisionsuppdrag och utredningar. Revisionsuppdragen utförs i team och som ledare eller medlem i sådana team kommer du att vara involverad i alla faser av uppdraget, från planering till rapportering av resultaten till ledningen. I revisionsuppdragen kommer du att riskbaserat utvärdera och utmana befintliga arbetsmetoder i de processer som granskas. Du kommer därmed att hjälpa till att identifiera behov av och föreslå förbättringar av effektiviteten och ändamålsenligheten i interna processer och robustheten i interna kontroller för att bidra till att förbättra Vattenfalls verksamhet.
   

  

 Förutom revisionsuppdragen kommer du också att vara involverad i utredningar av händelser som rapporterats till visselblåsarfunktionen.
   

  

 Eftersom Group Internal Audit täcker hela Vattenfall koncernen, kommer du att ha möjlighet att få insikter i olika affärsområden och mycket goda möjligheter till vidare lärande och utveckling.
   

  

 Du kommer att rapportera direkt till Director Internal Audit Nordic.
   

  

 Din bakgrund
   

  

**Vi söker dig som:**
* Har akademisk examen i företagsekonomi, teknik, IT eller andra relevanta ämnen
* Har god analytisk förmåga och kan se och bedöma väsentlighet i såväl helheten som detaljer.
* Behärskar svenska och engelska obehindrat, både i skrift och tal
* Erfarenhet av internrevision eller processgranskningar är meriterande.
* Är, eller har ambition att bli, certifierad internrevisor (CIA) och/eller certifierad IT-revisor (CISA).


 För att lyckas i rollen behöver du som person vara driven och relationsskapande. Du är pålitlig och har stark integritet, vilket vi ser som grundläggande. Vidare är du nyfiken, uppskattar att sätta dig in för dig nya områden och kan på ett konstruktivt sätt utmana rådande arbetsmetoder och processer.
   

  

 Mer information
   

  

 Tjänsten är baserad i
 **Solna** 
 . Då Group Internal Audit täcker hela Vattenfall koncernen förekommer regelbundet resor till Vattenfalls övriga verksamhetsorter.
   

  

 Förutom att få vara med och forma framtidens smarta energisamhälle erbjuder vi dig ett utvecklande och omväxlande arbete med många kontaktytor. För oss på Vattenfall är det viktigt att arbete och privatliv har en god balans, därför erbjuder vi flexibilitet i arbetet samt möjlighet till att arbeta hemifrån vid behov. Vi har även en hel del andra personalförmåner som exempelvis arbetstidsförkortning, förmånliga tjänstepensionsavtal, föräldraledighetstillägg med mera. Läs mer om våra förmåner och annat här: https://careers.vattenfall.com/se/sv/jobba-med-oss
   

  

**Välkommen med din** 
 ansökan
 **senast den 16 februari** 
 . Urval och intervjuer kan komma att ske löpande, vänta därför inte till sista dagen med din ansökan. Vi tar endast emot ansökningar via vår webbplats.
   

  

**För mer information** 
 om tjänsten välkomna att kontakta rekryterande chef Daniel Jansson 072 512 48 51 och om rekryteringsprocessen kontakta rekryterare Peter Blixter, 072-237 32 02.
   

  

 Fackliga representanter Rolf Ohlsson (Akademikerna), Christer Gustafsson (Ledarna), Lennart Bengtsson (SEKO), Inger Strandberg (Unionen) nås via Vattenfalls växel, 08 739 50 00
   

  

*Vattenfall är en del av Sveriges kritiska infrastruktur, därmed är många av våra tjänster säkerhetsklassade. Är denna tjänst säkerhetsklassad kommer säkerhetsprövning genomföras innan anställning, i enlighet med säkerhetsskyddslagen.*
**Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!**
 Om oss
   

  

 Vattenfall är en av Europas största producenter och återförsäljare av el och värme. Våra huvudmarknader är Sverige, Tyskland, Nederländerna, Danmark och Storbritannien. Inom Vattenfallkoncernen finns cirka 21 000 anställda. Vi brinner för en fossilfri framtid och har elektrifierat industrier, levererat energi till bostäder och förvandlat tillvaron genom innovation i över hundra års tid.

title: Strategic Account Advisor
company_industry: Software Development, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Technology, Information and Internet
description:
*To get the best candidate experience, please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating efforts.*
 Job Category
   

  

 Sales
   

  

 Job Details
   

  

**About Salesforce**
 We’re Salesforce, the Customer Company, inspiring the future of business with AI+ Data +CRM. Leading with our core values, we help companies across every industry blaze new trails and connect with customers in a whole new way. And, we empower you to be a Trailblazer, too — driving your performance and career growth, charting new paths, and improving the state of the world. If you believe in business as the greatest platform for change and in companies doing well and doing good – you’ve come to the right place.
   

  

 This is a unique opportunity to join a team of ex- Top Tier Strategy Consultants, working as a SWAT team for the Northern Europe CEO. Salesforce is looking for very hardworking and passionate individuals to be based in Sweden who can effectively articulate how & why our solutions can help transform Customers’ business and exceed their goals!
   

  

 Salesforce is aspiring to deliver business transformation enabled by technology to its customers and therefore requires individuals able to develop deep insight into the business dynamics of large, sophisticated enterprises and help shape customers change agenda.
   

  

 This role is an exciting blend of frontline commercial execution and long-term strategic thinking.
   

  

 You will work with our Enterprise sales teams on the biggest and most important sales opportunities in across the Nordics and Benelux, engaging with C-level customers and providing structure, insight, and leadership to help sales teams drive opportunities over the finish line. Specifically, this role is passionate about definition of Account Strategies, delivery of C-Level value propositions, investment justifications and development of sophisticated deal structures and commercial proposals for large deals.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Work with Enterprise sales teams to define the commercial strategy; prioritise sales initiatives based on problems, value creation potential, and customers’ strategic priorities
* Build and deliver compelling Investment Justifications to secure Customers’ funding for Salesforce solutions. Work closely with account teams and customers to identify, analyse key business value drivers
* Articulate how our solutions will digitally transform customers’ businesses at scale
* Put together attractive deal structures and articulate the value of our Proposals
* Create and deliver C- level compelling propositions as basis for strategic technology decisions


**Experience & Skills**
* Required experience in a Top -Tier Strategy Consulting Firm
* Role seniority determined by experience levels
* Strong analytical & problem solving skills essential
* Strong ability to create, quantify insights and communicate recommendations to CxOs
* Strong influencing capabilities; must be a self-starter, high energy
* Strong inclination to Technology & Enterprise Software industry
* Strong appetite to work in a consultative strategic selling environment.
* MBA degree
* For this role, it is essential that candidates are proficient in Swedish.


 Accommodations
   

  

 If you require assistance due to a disability applying for open positions please submit a request via this Accommodations Request Form.
   

  

 Posting Statement
   

  

 At Salesforce we believe that the business of business is to improve the state of our world. Each of us has a responsibility to drive Equality in our communities and workplaces. We are committed to creating a workforce that reflects society through inclusive programs and initiatives such as equal pay, employee resource groups, inclusive benefits, and more. Learn more about Equality at www.equality.com and explore our company benefits at www.salesforcebenefits.com.
   

  

 Salesforce is an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender perception or identity, national origin, age, marital status, protected veteran status, or disability status. Salesforce does not accept unsolicited headhunter and agency resumes. Salesforce will not pay any third-party agency or company that does not have a signed agreement with Salesforce.
   

  

 ﻿Salesforce welcomes all.
