title: Deskside Support SME
description:
Role : Deskside Support
 



 Location : Stockholm, Sweden
 



 Type : Contract
 



 JD
 



 We are seeking an experienced Exchange Online Level 3 Subject Matter Expert to join our team as a Transition Specialist. The ideal candidate will possess deep knowledge of Exchange Online, proficiency in PowerShell scripting for heavy automation, and experience with transitioning to new environments. This role is critical for ensuring seamless transitions, efficient automation, and optimal performance of our Exchange Online services.
 



  





 Key Responsibilities:
 



 - Lead and manage the transition of Exchange Online environments, ensuring minimal disruption to operations.
 



 - Develop and implement PowerShell scripts for heavy automation of Exchange Online tasks and processes.
 



 - Provide Level 3 support for troubleshooting and resolving complex issues related to Exchange Online.
 



 - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and deploy Exchange Online solutions. - Conduct performance tuning and optimization of Exchange Online services.
 



 - Develop and maintain comprehensive documentation for Exchange Online configurations, scripts, and processes.
 



 - Train and mentor Level 1 and 2 support teams on Exchange Online architecture and troubleshooting techniques.
 



 - Ensure compliance with industry standards and best practices in cloud services and automation.
 



 - Participate in project planning and execution, providing technical expertise and guidance.
 



  





  





 Required Skills and Qualifications:
 



 - Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field.
 



 - Extensive experience with Exchange Online administration and support.
 



 - Proficiency in PowerShell scripting for automation of Exchange Online tasks.
 



 - Strong troubleshooting skills and experience with providing Level 3 support.
 



 - Excellent understanding of cloud services, email systems, and related technologies.
 



 - Experience with performance tuning and system optimization in an Exchange Online context.
 



 - Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams.
 



 - Proven ability to develop and maintain technical documentation.
 



 - Familiarity with industry standards and best practices in cloud services and automation.
 



  





 Preferred Qualifications:
 



 - Relevant certifications in Exchange Online or related technologies.
 



 - Experience with additional cloud services and automation tools.
 



 - Knowledge of scripting languages and automation tools for Exchange Online.

title: Cloud Arkitekt
description:
Choosing Capgemini means choosing a company where you will be empowered to shape your career in the way you’d like, where you’ll be supported and inspired by a collaborative community of colleagues around the world, and where you’ll be able to reimagine what’s possible. Join us and help the world’s leading organizations unlock the value of technology and build a more sustainable, more inclusive world.
   

  

**OM ROLLEN**
 Vill du vara med och forma framtidens molnlösningar?
   

  

 Du blir en del av Capgeminis Cloud & Infrastructure Services (CIS)-enhet med fokus på projekt- och konsulttjänster i Norden. Vårt mål är att erbjuda kunder helhetslösningar inom Cloud och vi erbjuder en mängd olika tjänster till våra kunder, från strategisk rådgivning till projektgenomförande.
   

  

 Som Cloud Arkitekt kommer du att:
   

  

* Designa och implementera skalbara, säkra och kostnadseffektiva molnarkitektur, som uppfyller affärsbehoven
* Samarbeta med tvärfunktionella team för att samla in krav, definiera tekniska specifikationer och utveckla molnlösningar, som är i linje med affärsmålen och främjar hållbarhet (GreenOps)
* Utvärdera molntekniker och tjänster för att rekommendera bästa praxis och lösningar för att optimera prestanda, tillförlitlighet och skalbarhet
* Designa och distribuera molninfrastruktur med hjälp av ledande plattformar som AWS, Azure och/eller GCP
* Utveckla och underhålla dokumentation, diagram och riktlinjer för moln-arkitektur
* Ge tekniskt ledarskap och mentorskap till juniora teammedlemmar, vilket främjar en kultur av kontinuerligt lärande och tillväxt
* Hålla dig uppdaterad gällande teknologier och branschtrender för att driva innovation och förbättra våra molnerbjudanden
* Arbeta nära kunder, partners och andra affärsenheter för att utveckla och genomföra innovativa och konkurrenskraftiga lösningar/projekt för nya och befintliga kunder genom att utnyttja dina tidigare erfarenheter av att implementera molnlösningar


**DIN PROFIL**
* Erfarenhet av att skapa högtillgängliga molninfrastrukturlösningar för stora organisationer
* Gedigen kunskap om funktioner och möjligheter hos AWS, Azure och/eller GCP
* God förståelse för cloud-native arkitektur, mikrotjänster, containerisering och serverlös databehandling
* Erfarenhet av verktyg för Infrastructure as Code (IaC), såsom Terraform eller CloudFormation
* Erfarenhet av att skapa greenfield-lösningar och implementera landningszoner enligt bästa praxis
* Erfarenhet av att snabbt utvärdera teknisk genomförbarhet och utveckla förslag för migrering av workloads till AWS, Azure och/eller GCP
* Kunskap om praxis och verktyg för ekonomisk drift (FinOps) för optimering och hantering av molnkostnader
* Certifieringar såsom AWS Certified Solutions Architect, Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert eller Google Professional Cloud Architect är meriterande
* Erfarenhet av nätverksintegration med AWS Direct Connect eller Azure Express Route samt nätverksdesign (WAN/LAN/brandväggar)
* Förståelse för hybridmolnlösningar och erfarenhet av att integrera offentligt moln i traditionella hosting-/leveransmodeller
* Svenska och engelska i tal och skrift


 Capgemini is a global leader in partnering with companies to transform and manage their business by harnessing the power of technology. The Group is guided everyday by its purpose of unleashing human energy through technology for an inclusive and sustainable future. It is a responsible and diverse organization of nearly 350,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong 55-year heritage and deep industry expertise, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to address the entire breadth of their business needs, from strategy and design to operations, fueled by the fast evolving and innovative world of cloud, data, AI, connectivity, software, digital engineering and platforms. The Group reported 2022 global revenues of €22 billion. Get the Future You Want | www.capgemini.com

title: Azure Virtual Desktop/Citrix Specialist
description:
**A Z U R E V I R T U A L D E S K T O P / C I T R I X S P E C I A L I S T
   

  

 \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_**
 Full-time | Permanent | Team Workspace
   

  

**A B O U T X E N I T**
 Xenit is a growth company which specializes in Cloud and Modern Work. Our committed employees inspire, challenge and encourage each other, while providing extensive value for our customers. Xenit is
 **Microsoft's Partner of the Year, Sweden** 
 for 2024, illustrating our commitment to technical development, being on the cutting edge of tech, and our close partnership with Microsoft.
   

  

*Fun fact: Team Manager, Victor Nasslander, was voted Xenit's favourite manager for 2024 🥇*
**W H A T W E N E E D 🙏🏻**
 We are currently looking for a specialist within
 **Azure Virtual Desktop, Citrix, Netscaler** 
 and all the fun virtualization technologies 🤖💻
   

  

 At Xenit, we have two teams who typically look for Cloud based competence: Our Cloud Infrastructure Team, and our Workspace team. The Workspace team is responsible for managing the
 **Xenit Azure Virtual Desktop feature service** 
 , which you will have the opportunity to continuously develop and improve, as well as implementing solutions for our customers. Like most people with sense, we hate carrying out the same task time and time again, so you will make sure to streamline and automate anything that
 *can* 
 be automated.
   

  

**Examples Of Potential Tasks**
* Managing customers' AVD environments (including incident management, change management and developing environments).
* Participating in projects with a focus on implementation and set up of Virtual Workspace solutions
* Acting as a general Azure resource in other consulting assignments (dependent on level of Azure expertise)


**C O U L D Y O U B E A M A T C H ?**
**We Believe Our Next AVD/Citrix Specialist Has**
* 3+ years of experience within Microsoft Azure; preferably Azure Virtual Desktop, Azure Compute, Virtualization & Scalability
* Experience with cloud migration, transition or transformation projects
* Experience with Citrix or other virtual environments
* General skills within Infrastructure: Windows Server, Linux, Networking, Security


 So we aren't looking for the most senior person in the land, but we do want a good background within infrastructure, some proven experience within Cloud (Azure, AVD if possible), a consultant personality/attitude and a passion for technology 💞💻
   

  

**It Is a Bonus If You Have**
* Skills within Automation
* Relevant certifications/education


 Right: Expert Engineer, Hanessa and left: Team Manager, Victor Nasslander
   

  

**We Also Believe That You Are a Person Who**
* Acts on their own initiative, makes things happen and takes responsibility for their own work/successes/failures.
* Has their head in the clouds - a "cloud first" approach ☁️
* Is hungry to be better and to excel within their career
* Fluent in spoken and written Swedish and English
* Above all else, displays kindness and compassion in everything they do 💕


**W H Y C H O O S E X E N I T ?**
**Benefits 🎁**
 Xenit boasts a large benefits package, read full list here.
   

  

**Super interesting colleagues 🎉**
 With us you will find spinning instructors, parkour practitioners, gamers, art historians, rugby players, puzzle maniacs, film geeks and much more.
   

  

 With us, you are free to be who you are. Our workforce is so diverse, that one of the only things each person has in common is an incredible drive and passion for what they do.
   

  

**Activities ⛹🏻**
 Each quarter, we host
 **Xenit Inspire** 
 where employees are able to share specialist knowledge, information about cool projects, and take part in tasks centered around innovation - workshops and hackathons. We also offer annual conferences, team building, after works, and "Bring a Buddy" lunches at the office.
   

  

 Last year, Xenit was awarded
 **"Career Company of 2024"** 
 . This prestigious recognition underscores our commitment to fostering a workplace culture that values inclusivity, well-being, and growth.
   

  

*"Xenit is an outstanding employer where corporate culture and well-being are at the center. Here, the employees are part of a warm and inclusive community where their well-being and well-being are prioritized. By offering an environment where collaboration, creativity and innovation are encouraged, employees can thrive and develop while contributing to the company's success."*
**Read More About Karriar Företagen Here.**
 Xenit's goal is not only to become Sweden's leading cloud partner, but to be Sweden's kindest cloud partner.
   

  

 Our theory is that satisfied workers produce satisfying work, and so we aim to create a working environment in which our employees can thrive - working independently, flexibly and happily.
   

  

 We are happy with hybrid remote working, encourage collaboration between offices and freedom in choosing devices/equipment & working hours.
   

  

 Why not find out more about us?

title: Security Engineer
company_industry: Transportation, Logistics, Supply Chain and Storage
description:
Want to be part of transforming road freight – for good? Einride is showing the world a new way to move, based on the latest digital, electric and autonomous technologies. Through freight capacity as a service, we enable businesses around the world to accelerate towards their sustainability goals.
   

  

 Founded in 2016, Einride became the first company in the world to deploy a cab-less autonomous electric vehicle on a public road (Sweden, 2019). In 2022, we were the first to successfully operate such a vehicle on a US public road. Today our award-winning technology has been launched across 8 countries (and counting). Our clients are some of the world’s biggest shippers, including Fortune 500 companies.
   

  

**What you'll do:**
* Build, integrate and operate our security monitoring platforms that ensure we can detect and respond to security incidents in all our environments, including user endpoints, SaaS applications, cloud infrastructure as well as our Freight Capacity as a Service platforms
* Build, manage and mature the vulnerability management program (including workstations, network perimeter, containers, source code, cloud configuration, etc) and build the appropriate security metrics to help drive risk-based decisions and investments
* Build out our application security program that allows engineers to be self-empowered when appropriate and able to get assistance when required. Participate in threat modeling sessions and provide security advice in design of new and existing features


**What we're looking for (you don’t need to tick all the boxes):**
* Working experience in securing and monitoring public cloud infrastructure (e.g., GCP, AWS, Azure)
* Working experience in vulnerability management on multiple layers of the modern IT and software stackExperience with security incident management (preferably in a SOC, CDC or similar)
* Ability to code/script and automate repetitive tasks. We primarily use Go but if you have a general knack for coding, that matters more than having previous experience with a specific language
* Great collaboration and communication skills, since you’ll be part of driving initiatives that span across the entire company


 This position is based in Stockholm or Gothenburg. We recommend you submit your application as soon as possible as selection and interviews are held continually.
   

  

 At Einride, we are innovators, building solutions the world has never seen before – but urgently needs. That’s why we take action, and it’s why we are always eager to be challenged. We know that our best innovations come from having a diverse mix of people, including those of different experiences, career paths, and walks of life. By coming together and sharing our perspectives openly – by disagreeing, discussing, and committing – we deliver greater impact.
   

  

 Please note that as part of our standard recruitment process, we conduct a background control on the final candidate for this role. This may include verification of education, employment history, any relevant professional certifications or other information that may be of our interest.

title: Product Marketing Specialist
description:
Product Marketing Specialist
 
  





 We’re Talentium, a fast-growing startup revolutionizing human capital management.
 



 We’re looking for a
 **Product Marketing Specialist** 
 who loves to get things done. This is Talentium’s first marketing hire and we’re looking for someone comfortable
 **being hands-on from day one** 
 , owning our go-to-market approach, refining our product positioning, and creating cases for customer retention. This is a unique opportunity to \*\*\*\*shape our marketing from the ground up. You’re operationally minded, a strong self-starter, and thrive in a fast-moving environment where
 **execution matters more than just strategy.** 




  





**Responsibilities** 



* Increase product usage by executing high-impact marketing campaigns and messaging.
* Build and optimize lifecycle email campaigns and nurture flows to boost engagement and reduce churn.
* Develop and execute organic marketing strategies to generate inbound interest and expand our audience.
* Create compelling content for blogs, emails, social media, and other channels to support both acquisition and retention.
* Own and achieve key KPIs (engagement, retention, inbound leads, content performance) through continuous iteration.
* Support product launches with effective messaging, marketing materials, and sales enablement content.
* Gather insights to refine positioning and ensure Talentium stays ahead of the competition.



  





**What we’re looking for** 



* 3+ years of experience in product marketing, or growth marketing (ideally in SaaS B2B in start-up phase).
* A versatile marketer who takes initiative, sets ambitious goals, and takes full responsibility for delivering results.
* Strong hands-on and action-oriented approach, with the ability for strategic thinking
* Proficiency in analytics tools for tracking and optimizing campaigns.
* Excellent storytelling and communication skills, with an ability to craft messaging that drives engagement.
* Comfortable working cross-functionally with Product, Sales, and Customer Success teams.
* **Bonus:** 
 Background in HR tech, recruitment, or workflow automation tools.



  





 Join the future of work!

title: Account Executive
description:
Account Executive
 
  





 We’re Talentium, a fast-growing startup revolutionizing human capital management.
 



 We’re looking for an Account Executive who can manage the entire sales funnel - from prospecting and qualifying leads to closing deals. You will work closely with the Commercial team to develop strategies for driving revenue growth and expanding Talentium’s customer base. This role is ideal for a results-driven professional who thrives on building meaningful client relationships and exceeding targets.
 



  





 Responsibilities
 


* Manage the full sales cycle, from prospecting to closing deals.
* Develop and execute account strategies to achieve revenue goals.
* Provide customer feedback to improve product offerings, marketing strategies, and overall go-to-market execution.
* Build and maintain relationships with decision-makers, including talent acquisition teams and C-level executives
* Work closely with the Customer Success team to ensure smooth onboarding and satisfaction.
* Track and report sales activities and performance metrics using our CRM.
* Understand Talentium’s solutions inside and out to effectively communicate value to potential clients.



  





 What we’re looking for
 


* 1-3 years of experience in a SaaS B2B sales role, with a proven track record of meeting or exceeding quotas.
* Strong understanding of B2B SaaS sales processes and methodologies.
* Someone who thrives on action, takes initiative, and doesn’t wait for direction to make an impact.
* Strong communication and relationship-building skills, with a customer-first mindset.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to craft compelling messages.
* A data-driven approach, comfortable tracking performance metrics and optimizing strategies.
* Bonus: Background in HR tech or start-ups



  





 Join the future of work!

title: Seniora konsulter inom infrastruktur
description:
**Kompetensen vi söker** 




 Till vårt team i Stockholm behöver vi engagerade konsulter inom infrastruktur som vill bidra till att bygga vårt samhälle.
 



  





 Vi söker följande kompetenser:
 


* produktionsledare
* byggledare
* byggplatsuppföljare
* besiktningsmän
* experter inom väg och anläggning
* experter inom energiutbyggnad
* experter inom processindustri och kärnkraft



  





 Eftersom vi startar upp verksamheten inom infrastruktur i Stockholm behöver du vara drivande, ha ett stort kontaktnät och stimuleras av att bygga upp någonting nytt. Vidare har du ett starkt självledarskap och är en driven positiv problemlösare som vågar fatta beslut.
 



  





 Vi tror också att du lockas av samhällsaspekten av dessa viktiga projekt, där du verkligen kan göra en skillnad för framtida utveckling.
 



  





 Vi ser gärna att du har minst 10 års erfarenhet inom ditt kompetensområde.
 



  





 Kunderna kommer utgöras av både entreprenörer och beställare.
 



  





**Om STHK** 




 STHK är ett växande expertföretag byggt på mjuka värderingar och övertygelsen att om våra medarbetare mår bra kommer detta även att gagna våra kunder. Vi har en platt organisation och det personliga inflytandet över din arbetssituation och utveckling är stort. Vi uppmuntrar innovation, personlig utveckling och spridning av kunskap. Vi är självständiga men hjälper varandra. Och vi ser till att ha kul på vägen.
 



  





**Vad får du av oss?** 




 Vi erbjuder olika lönemodeller för att passa just din situation. Vi har en provisionsbaserad lönemodell som ger dig en frihet att styra över din egen tid, utveckling och inriktning. Du disponerar en del av din inkomst i en pott som kan användas för till exempel utbildningar, mässor och teknisk utrustning. Din månadslön kan sättas utifrån ditt uppdrag samt beläggning.
 



  





 För dig som lägger större vikt vid en förutsägbar månadslön, har vi även en fast lönemodell.
 



  





 I ryggen får du ett nätverk av kompetenta och trevliga kollegor med olika erfarenheter och kunskaper. Vi tror på att om våra anställda mår bra, kommer det gagna att hela företaget och våra kunder. Därmed är det även viktigt för oss att träffas och ha trevligt tillsammans. Detta görs i form av olika träffar såsom konferensresor, klassiska aws, föreläsningar med mera.
 



  





 Dina medarbetare består inte bara av STHK utan även av vår finska partner Welados internationella team. Detta samarbete accelererar och skapar möjligheter för intressanta uppdrag och ökat kunskapsutbyte.
 



  





**Vad förväntar vi oss av dig?** 




 Förutom att du naturligtvis är kunnig inom ditt yrkesområde vill vi att du delar våra grundläggande värderingar som du kan se på bilden. Andra personliga egenskaper vi håller högt är prestigelöshet, pragmatism och att man är en lagspelare.
 



  





**Hör av dig!** 




 Vi hanterar ansökningarna löpande, så skicka in din ansökan redan nu! Tveka inte att höra av dig om du har några frågor kring rollen.

title: Lösningsarkitekt
description:
***Som lösningsarkitekt hos oss har du en nyckelroll hos våra kunder, och du gör skillnad genom att omvandla våra kunders visioner och behov till hållbara IT-lösningar – vill du vara med?***
**Om rollen**
 Som lösningsarkitekt har du en bred teknisk bakgrund samtidigt som du förstår verksamhetens behov och utmaningar och kan omsätta dessa till funktionella och icke-funktionella krav. Du kan hantera och mitigera risker, samla intressenter, har goda ledaregenskaper och är en duktig kommunikatör.
   

  

 I rollen kommer du in tidigt in i projekten med uppgiften att förstå verksamhetens mål och behov för att omsätta detta till den lösningsarkitektur som ger mest värde till verksamheten. Du arbetar i tät samverkan med både expertkollegor från Capgemini och kunden, tillsammans med utvecklingsteam, produktägare och kundens övriga intressenter.
   

  

 Vår starka position på marknaden med kunder som är Sveriges största och mest välkända både inom den publika och privata sektorn har gett oss möjligheten till omfattande och spännande åtaganden inom digital transformation. Det utmanar oss att ständigt utvecklas.
   

  

 Vi arbetar professionellt och metodiskt i en lärande miljö och både din teamchef och ditt kompetensteam stöttar dig och din utveckling som konsult. Vi träffas ofta för att utbyta erfarenheter, lära oss nya saker i en bransch som ständigt förändras – och inte minst för att ha kul tillsammans!
   

  

**Vi söker dig med**
* Flera års erfarenhet som lösningsarkitekt
* Bakgrund inom systemutveckling, och vana av att leda andra
* Erfarenhet av arbete med etablerade metodiker och ramverk för arkitektur och agil systemutveckling.
* Högskoleutbildning eller motsvarande
* Goda kunskaper i såväl svenska som engelska


**… och erfarenhet eller intresse av:**
* konsultrollen samt av arbete med beslutsfattare
* att verka utifrån kundens perspektiv och förmåga att analysera och utforma arkitektur och systemlösningar baserat på verksamhetens krav, processer och informationsbehov
* molnbaserade lösningar, AI, säkerhet, processautomatisering eller integration
* arbete som lösningsarkitekt i komplexa miljöer, och/eller med lösningar baserade på Salesforce eller Pega.
* Certifierad IT-arkitekt


**Vi erbjuder**
* En positiv arbetsmiljö med starkt fokus på innovation och kompetens. Du kommer att arbeta med många av de senaste tekniktrenderna och vara omgiven av duktiga kollegor.
* På Capgemini blir du en del av en global organisation med starkt kundfokus, samarbetskultur och möjlighet till kontinuerligt lärande och utveckling.
* Vårt Digital Architecture-team i Stockholm består av ca 20 kollegor som arbetar som Enterprise-, Verksamhets- och lösningsarkitekter hos våra kunder.
* Capgemini har varit en dominerande aktör inom arkitekturområdet sedan 90-talet, med vårt eget ramverk Integrated Architecture Framework (IAF) och vi bidrar även aktivt till vidareutvecklingen av TOGAF.
* Vi har ett aktivt, globalt arkitektforum med lokala undergrupper där du kan dra nytta av globala och lokala experter inom arkitektur och även bidra med din egen erfarenhet.


**Våra värderingar**
* Honesty, Boldness, Trust, Freedom, Team spirit, Modesty and Fun


**Om Capgemini**
 Capgemini är en global partner inom affärs- och tekniktransformation som hjälper organisationer att påskynda deras övergång till en digital och hållbar värld, och samtidigt gör skillnad för företag och samhälle. Det är en ansvarsfull och mångsidig organisation med 340 000 medarbetare i över 50 länder. Med ett starkt arv som sträcker sig över 55 år tillbaka har Capgemini sina kunders förtroende att hjälpa dem frigöra värdet av teknik för att tillgodose hela deras affärsbehov. Capgemini levererar helhetslösningar som utnyttjar styrkan från strategi och design till teknik. Allt drivet av en marknadsledande kapacitet inom AI, moln och data, kombinerat med en djup branschexpertis och ett ekosystem av partners. År 2023 rapporterade Capgemini Group globala intäkter på 22,5 miljarder euro.
   

  

 Get The Future You Want | www.capgemini.com

title: M365 Architect/SME
description:
Choosing Capgemini means choosing a company where you will be empowered to shape your career in the way you’d like, where you’ll be supported and inspired by a collaborative community of colleagues around the world, and where you’ll be able to reimagine what’s possible. Join us and help the world’s leading organizations unlock the value of technology and build a more sustainable, more inclusive world.
 



  





**THE ROLE** 




 We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Microsoft 365 Technical Architect to join our team. As a Microsoft 365 Architect, you will be responsible for designing and implementing Microsoft 365 solutions for our clients. You will work closely with clients to understand their business requirements and provide technical expertise to ensure successful deployment and adoption of Microsoft 365 technologies.
 



  





 We are looking for a profile with a solid Microsoft 365 technical background combined with strong customer leadership skills. This role will require significant customer interaction and will drive architecture planning. The candidate must have broad, multi-discipline, Enterprise IT experience and must deliver customer-centric solutions that improve the user experience.
 



  




* Work closely with customers to understand their technical and business needs and design Microsoft 365 SAAS based solutions that align with their goals and objectives to demonstrate how their Cloud Strategy aligns with Microsoft technology
* Develop and implement technical architectures for Microsoft 365 SAAS applications (Exchange, SharePoint, Teams etc.), Microsoft Entra ID, Microsoft Intune, hybrid on-premises technologies (AD, Entra Connect, ADFS, etc.) utilizing major 3rd party Identity Provider Solutions such as Ping ID and/or Okta and hygiene technologies and migration tools
* Develop and implement security controls for the aforementioned solutions with Microsoft security tools
* Conduct technical assessments and audits to identify areas for improvement and optimization within existing Microsoft 365 environments
* Stay up to date with the latest Microsoft 365 technologies, features, and best practices, and provide recommendations to clients for leveraging these advancements
* Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues related to Microsoft 365, including performance, connectivity, and security concerns
* Maintain documentation of technical architectures, configurations, and procedures related to Microsoft 365 solutions



  





**YOUR PROFILE** 



* Bachelor’s Degree or higher in Information Systems, Computer Science, or equivalent
* Certifications, such as Microsoft 365 Certified: Enterprise Administrator Expert or Microsoft 365 Certified: Security Administrator Associate, are highly desirable
* Working in Identity and Access Management context with Microsoft technologies
* Full working proficiency in both Swedish and English
* Experience in a customer-facing technology consultancy role.
* Good understanding and working experience with ITSM Tools and ITIL Methodology
* Experience working in a multi-national organization and having good cultural sensitivity awareness



  





 Good to have:
 


* Ability to manage, and maintain M365 Backups, Disaster Recovery solutions;
* ITIL3/ITIL4 Certification, or 2+ years’ equivalent experience in an IT Service Management
* Device Management and BYOD/MDM Design and Deployment experience
* Understand complex architecture across multiple environment stacks and technologies
* Architecture modeling language skills such as TOGAF
* M365 Copilot



  





 Capgemini is a global leader in partnering with companies to transform and manage their business by harnessing the power of technology. The Group is guided everyday by its purpose of unleashing human energy through technology for an inclusive and sustainable future. It is a responsible and diverse organization of nearly 350,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong 55-year heritage and deep industry expertise, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to address the entire breadth of their business needs, from strategy and design to operations, fueled by the fast evolving and innovative world of cloud, data, AI, connectivity, software, digital engineering and platforms. The Group reported 2022 global revenues of €22 billion. Get the Future You Want | www.capgemini.com

title: Domänarkitekt - IT-säkerhet
description:
Svenska kraftnät är en av de viktigaste aktörerna för en hållbar energiomställning. Som Domänarkitekt inom IT-säkerhet får du ett av Sveriges mest betydelsefulla uppdrag inom IT-säkerhet, där du varje dag bidrar till en trygg och stabil elförsörjning.
   

  

 Som
 **domänarkitekt inom IT-säkerhet** 
 ansvarar du för att utforma och leda utvecklingen av Svenska kraftnäts IT-säkerhetsarkitektur. Du ingår i IT-arkitekturenheten och arbetar nära verksamhet, IT-divisionen och säkerhetsavdelningen för att skapa lösningar som möter både dagens krav och morgondagens utmaningar.
   

  

 Vi är i dag cirka 600 personer inom IT och vi kommer att växa ytterligare de kommande åren. Detta för att kunna skapa förutsättningar för Sverige att fördubbla sin elproduktion och nå klimatmålen genom att helt ställa om till fossilfri energi. För att lyckas kommer vi att använda oss av den senaste tekniken för att öka kapaciteten i vår infrastruktur och samtidigt öka utvecklingstakten kring system, digitalisering och processer.
   

  

 Om tjänsten
   

  

 Din roll innebär strategiskt, taktiskt och operativt arbete, där du analyserar verksamhetens behov och tar fram målarkitekturer och färdplaner för IT-säkerhetsområdet. Du identifierar utmaningar och möjligheter, säkerställer helhetsperspektivet och stödjer projekt och initiativ med din expertis. Genom att vägleda lösningsarkitekter och andra intressenter ser du till att säkerhetslösningarna både implementeras och hålls samman.
   

  

**Huvudsakliga Arbetsuppgifter**
* Säkerställa att strategi, styrande principer och riktlinjer för IT-säkerhetsarkitektur kontinuerligt utvecklas och efterlevs
* Utveckla och underhålla målarkitekturer och färdplaner för IT-säkerhetsområdet
* Genomföra behovsanalyser och säkerställa en sammanhållen, robust och ändamålsenligt IT-säkerhetsarkitektur
* Stödja projekt och initiativ i frågor avseende IT-säkerhetsarkitektur
* Samarbeta nära säkerhetsavdelningen och andra funktioner för att uppfylla både interna krav och externa regelverk
* Delta i arkitektforum och bidra till att utveckla gemensamma arbetssätt
* Utvärdera nya teknologier och säkerhetslösningar


 Om dig
   

  

 Du har en tydlig vision för hur IT-säkerhetslösningar bör utformas och en djup förståelse för de komplexa frågeställningarna inom området. Du är strukturerad och målmedveten, med förmågan att skapa tydliga planer och leverera resultat.
   

  

 Med en stabil och trygg framtoning hanterar du utmaningar på ett konstruktivt sätt och vågar stå upp för dina beslut. Samtidigt är du prestigelös och lyhörd, vilket gör att du framgångsrikt kan samarbeta med olika funktioner och intressenter. Din kommunikativa förmåga och resultatorienterade arbetssätt gör att du driver diskussioner framåt och säkerställer hållbara lösningar som möter både verksamhetens behov och strategiska mål. Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.
   

  

 Din bakgrund
   

  

 Vi Söker Dig Som Har En Relevant Akademisk Utbildning, Alternativt Motsvarande Utbildning Eller Kompetens Förvärvad På Annat Sätt, Som Svenska Kraftnät Bedömer Likvärdig. Du Har En Bred Och Gedigen Bakgrund Inom IT-arkitektur Och IT-säkerhet, Med Erfarenhet Av Infrastruktur-, Applikations- Och Klientsäkerhet. Vidare Har Du
   

  

* Flera års erfarenhet i rollen som IT-Säkerhetsarkitekt
* Erfarenhet av att utforma och implementera IT-säkerhetslösningar i större organisationer
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med målarkitekturer och att utveckla långsiktiga planer
* God förmåga att uttrycka dig i tal och skrift på både svenska och engelska


**Meriterande**
* Erfarenhet av arbete med IT-säkerhet inom en samhällskritisk verksamhet alternativt verksamhet med mycket höga säkerhetskrav
* Erfarenhet av relevanta ramverk som t.ex ISO27000 och NIST CSF
* Certifiering inom IT-säkerhet, till exempel CISSP
* Certifiering inom IT-arkitektur
* God kunskap inom IAM (Identity Access Management)
* Erfarenhet av säkerhet i OT-miljöer
* Erfarenhet av riskhantering, kontinuitetsplanering och kravställning mot leverantörer


 Bra att veta
   

  

* Tjänsten är placerad i Sundbyberg
* Viss möjlighet till distansarbete
* Resor kan förekomma i denna tjänst
* Sista ansökningsdag är den 21 februari 2025. Vi använder urvalsfrågor i vår rekrytering och behöver inget personligt brev, men önskar att du bifogar ditt CV.
* Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning


 För mer information kontakta gärna rekryterande chef Felipe Castillo: felipe.Castillo@svk.se alternativt ansvarig rekryterare på Boxhill Petra Törnblom: 0760036080 / petra.tornblom@bhill.se. Fackliga representanter är Annika Ingeborn, SACO, 010 475 87 72 och Mikael Hedenheim ST, 010 475 84 68. Du når oss också via e-post: fornamn.efternamn@svk.se
   

  

**Övrig information**
 Vi ställer höga krav på våra medarbetares säkerhets- och sekretessmedvetenhet. Innan ett beslut om anställning fattas kommer en säkerhetsprövning enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) att genomföras i de fall befattningen innebär hantering av säkerhetsskyddsklassificerade uppgifter eller deltagande i säkerhetskänslig verksamhet. Om anställningen avser befattning i säkerhetsklass kommer säkerhetsprövningen även att innefatta en registerkontroll och, i vissa fall, en särskild personutredning. För anställning på Svenska kraftnät krävs svenskt medborgarskap. Med anställningen följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras.
   

  

 För mer information om säkerhetsprövning Svenska kraftnät arbetar för att främja mångfald och motverka diskriminering och ser gärna sökanden med olika bakgrund och erfarenheter till våra rekryteringar. Lär känna Svenska kraftnät och hur det är att arbeta hos oss: Lär känna oss på Svenska kraftnät

title: Dataarkitekt - Data, Analytics & AI till Tietoevry Tech Services (m/f/d)
description:
**You may apply to Tietoevry by selecting Apply and fill your application details to the form. You may also Apply by using LinkedIn and populate details to your application from your LinkedIn profile.**
 Är du passionerad av att utnyttja kraften i data och artificiell intelligens för att driva affärstransformation? Har du erfarenhet av att leda utvecklingsteam och leverera innovativa lösningar? Då söker vi på Tietoevry Tech Services dig till rollen som Arkitekt inom Data, Analytics och AI. Vi driver transformationer över hela företaget inom kundernas affärsprocesser, applikationer och infrastruktur på den nordiska marknaden.
   

  

**I tjänsten som Data arkitekt inom Data, Analytics & AI hos Tietoevry Tech Services kommer du att:**
* Designa och vara ledande vid implementering av arkitekturer för data- och analytics-lösningar
* Jobba i nära samarbete med våra kunder för att förstå, definiera och prioritera deras behov och utveckla skräddarsydda lösningar
* Utvärdera och rekommendera teknologier och verktyg för att stödja bl a datainsamling, -hantering och -analys
* Leda workshops och utbildningar för att öka kundens förståelse för data och analytics
* Medverka till kontinuerlig utveckling av gruppen och erbjudanden till den svenska marknaden i det svenska teamet
* Ta en ledande roll, med nära kundkontakt, vid implementationsprojekt och agera som kundens kontaktperson mellan beställare, våra leveransteam och interna kundteam


**Vi söker dig som har:**
* Relevant akademisk utbildning inom IT, datavetenskap eller liknande
* Flera års erfarenhet av att arbeta med data- och analytics-lösningar, antingen i molnbaserade miljöer eller traditionella lösningar on-prem
* Har djup kunskap om arkitekturprinciper och moderna datateknologier inom data- och anlaytics-området
* Är kommunikativ och kan förklara komplexa koncept på ett enkelt sätt till kund med olika kunskap och erfarenheter från data- och analytics-området
* Har en problemlösande inställning och kan arbeta självständigt såväl som i team
* Det är fördelaktigt om du har erfarenhet av hybridleveranser med kombination av lokala resurser och near- och/eller offshore-enheter
* Du är flytande i svenska och engelska, såväl i tal som i skrift


**Vi erbjuder dig:**
 Vi erbjuder dig professionell tillväxt, meningsfulla projekt, en öppen kultur och en enastående balans mellan arbete och fritid. Vi erbjuder dig även en möjlighet att skapa framtiden för en växande, snabbt utvecklande och viktig sektor. Vi tror att vår organisationskultur är en viktig del av att möjliggöra din framgång. Vi tillhandahåller en flexibel hybrid arbetsmodell som en del av vår kultur och vårt arbetssätt. Slutligen tror vi också på nyfikenhet och lärande som en livsstil där du behöver utmana dig själv och lära dig nya färdigheter varje dag när nya möjligheter uppstår.
   

  

**Låter det inspirerande?**
 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan. Vänligen bifoga ditt CV eller din LinkedIn-profil så kontaktar vi dig. Intervjuer kommer att hållas löpande, så vi uppmuntrar dig att ansöka redan idag. Om du har några frågor angående denna roll, vänligen kontakta rekryteringschef Mikael Johansson, mikael.v.johansson@tietoevry.com.
   

  

 Vi hoppas att höra från dig snart.
   

  

*Vi utför bakgrundskontroller på alla slutkandidater. Tietoevry avvisar samtal från rekryteringsföretag.*
**Om Tietoevry**
 Tietoevry skapar meningsfull teknologi som återuppfinner världen till det bättre. Vi är ett ledande teknikföretag med stark nordisk arv och globala kapabiliteter. Baserat på våra kärnvärden öppenhet, förtroende och mångfald, arbetar vi med våra kunder för att utveckla digitala framtider där företag, samhällen och mänskligheten blomstrar.
   

  

 Våra 24 000 experter globalt specialiserar sig på cloud, data och mjukvara och betjänar tusentals företag och offentlig sektor kunder i mer än 90 länder. Tietoevrys årliga omsättning är cirka 3 miljarder EUR och företagets aktier är noterade på NASDAQ-börsen i Helsingfors och Stockholm, samt på Oslo Børs. Bekanta dig med vad vi gör.
   

  

 Skapar meningsfull teknologi för att återuppfinna världen till det bättre.
   

  

 At Tietoevry, we believe in the power of diversity, equity, and inclusion. We encourage applicants of all backgrounds, genders (m/f/d), and walks of life to join our team, as we believe that this fosters an inspiring workplace and fuels innovation. Our commitment to openness, trust, and diversity is at the heart of our mission to create digital futures that benefit businesses, societies, and humanity. Diversity, equity and inclusion (tietoevry.com)

title: Senior/Staff/Lead Application Security Analyst (Bangkok based, relocation provided)
description:
**About Agoda**
 Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more . Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.
   

  

**Our Purpose –** 
**Bridging the World Through Travel**
 We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.
   

  

 We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.
   

  

**Get to Know our Team:** 
  

  

 The Security Department oversees security, governance, risk management, and compliance, and security operations for all Agoda. We are vigilant in ensuring there is no breach or vulnerability threatening our company or endangering our employees to keep Agoda safe and protected. Given that the security ecosystem is moving forward at tremendous speed, we like to be early adaptors of recent technology and products. This would be a great challenge for those who want to work with the best technology in a dynamic and advanced environment.
   

  

**The Opportunity:**
 You will be working in a fast-paced DevOps environment where code change happens at a rapid speed and where it is paramount to control security testing into a continuous deployment/integration flow.
   

  

**In this Role, you’ll get to:**
* Develop Security Automation Tools to implement solutions at scale
* Triage security findings from different tools and work with hundreds of teams to get them remediated within the right SLA
* Conduct security assessments through code reviews, vulnerability testing and risk analysis
* Research on the negative effects of a vulnerability, from minimizing the impact to altering security controls for future prevention
* Identify potential threats so that the organization can protect itself from malicious hackers. This includes Vulnerability Management, Bug Bounty Program, Penetration Testing
* Be responsible for developing Security Training for developers
* Work with DevSecOps team in integration of tools into CI/CD, as well as fine-tune the rules and precision


**What you’ll Need to Succeed:**
* 5+ years in the information security field
* 5+ years of experience with Vulnerability Management
* Minimum 1 year of experience running a bug bounty platform
* Minimum 2yr experience with any of public/private cloud environments (Openshift, Rancher, K8s, AWS, GCP, Azure, etc.)
* Experience performing security testing, e.g. code review and web application security testing Internal
* Able to automate and script jobs e.g. go, bash scripts, etc
* Familiarity with Gitlab, Defectdojo, JIRA, Confluence
* Proficient in one or more programming languages such as Python, Go, Node.js, Python etc
* Familiar with analytics platform and databases such as GraphQL , REST APIs, Postgres, MSSQL, Kafka, Hadoop, S3 etc
* Strong knowledge in Assessment tools such as security scanners and fuzzers


**It’s great if you have:**
* Knowledge in Container Image Security, Vulnerability Management, Dependency Checking, Fuzzing and License Scanning
* Security Certifications
* Relocation package is provided in case you prefer to relocate to Bangkok, Thailand. Our benefits are…
* Hybrid Working Model
* WFH Set Up Allowance
* 30 Days of Remote Working from anywhere globally every year
* Employee discount for accommodation globally
* Global team of 90+ nationalities
* 40+ offices and 25+ countries
* Annual CSR / Volunteer Time off
* Benevity Subscription for employee donations
* Volunteering opportunities globally
* Free Headspace subscription
* Free Odilo & Udemy subscriptions
* Access to Employee Assistance Program (third party for personal and workplace support)
* Enhanced Parental Leave
* Life, TPD & Accident Insurance

title: Ruby Backend Engineer
description:
Did you know that fishing is the world’s most popular hobby? We do! And here at
 **Fishbrain** 
 we have built the world's #1 fishing app dedicated to people who love fishing. We want to make sure that we can give them the greatest experience possible and make their fishing dreams come true, today and tomorrow.
 



  





 We have over
 **15 million users** 
 all over the world who have logged over
 **16 million catches** 
 in our app.
 



  





 At
 **Fishbrain** 
 we believe in empowering our team members to achieve both personal and professional growth. We do that by encouraging innovation, collaboration and to live by the dare to fail mentality. We are committed to creating a workplace where everyone feels valued and respected. We embrace unique perspectives, backgrounds and experiences. We truly believe that diversity fuels our innovation and drives our success.
 



  





 As a
 **Ruby Backend Engineer** 
 you will be a core member of one of our product teams. You will apply your technical expertise to build robust and well-architected APIs, and in addition to contributing with your coding skills, you’re expected to contribute ideas and input into all stages of the product lifecycle.
 




  





*Please submit applications in* 
***ENGLISH***
*, those that are not will not be reviewed.* 




  





**What you will be working on** 



* Collaborating as a member of a product-focused team to deliver data and functionality for consumption by our web and mobile apps.
* Work together to identify and address technical debt, code inefficiencies and performance bottlenecks to continuously improve our application, with the user’s experience and user business value in mind.
* Collaborate with platform engineers to deploy, monitor and maintain production environments, ensuring high availability and reliability of our applications.
* Participate in code reviews, providing constructive feedback to peers and fostering a culture of continuous improvement and learning.
* Act as a technical advocate in product discussion to represent our engineering capabilities and contribute to our overall technical strategy.
* Drive the architectural design and implementation of efficient, reusable backend systems and APIs that power our web and mobile applications.



  





**What we are fishing for:** 



* You have 5+ years of experience developing applications and APIs in Ruby, and running distributed services in a cloud environment.
* You have strong software engineering fundamentals, including data structures, design patterns, and complexity analysis.
* You have professional experience working with PostgreSQL or MySQL databases at a large scale.
* You bring valuable skills and insights, work effectively, collaborate in a supportive and innovative environment, where your contributions have an immediate impact.



**Extra nice to have:** 



* Experience designing GraphQL APIs.
* Experience with infrastructure such as Elasticsearch (especially Ruby plugin Searchkick), AWS, Docker or Terraform.
* Experience with Go or Python.
* Experience designing systems at scale and under heavy load.
* You have experience with working with geographic data in PostGIS.
* Experience with frontend development (React/Typescript).



  





**The Lighthouse** 
 (Fishbrain's HQ)
 



 Our office is based in Stockholm (Hötorget) and we have a
 **hybrid-remote work arrangement.** 
 We prioritize in-person collaboration, which means
 **we operate from our offices at least two days per week** 
 .
 



  





**Our Bait** 




 We’re a product-focused startup, and every individual is important. That means you get to contribute to the direction of the company and the impact we have on millions of anglers. We at Fishbrain work with the latest tech and challenge ourselves every day. We have a work culture that encourages innovation, passion and teamwork. And most importantly, we want you to enjoy coming to work every single day.
 



**In addition, Fishbrain also offers:** 




  





**🌴 30 days annual vacation** 




 Each year you’ll get 30 days vacation to use however, whenever
 



  





**🤸‍♀️ Wellness bonus** 




 5000 sek annual allowance to put towards anything in the realm of health and fitness
 



  





**💻📱 Technology of your choice** 




 Mac or Linux, you decide
 



  





**🎣 Fishing rods in the offices** 




 Grab one and go fishing during lunch. We have fishing guides and experts working among us that can help you catch your dream fish
 



  





**🐕 Dog friendly** 




 Feel free to bring your furry friend to the office
 



  





**🌎 Commitment to sustainability** 




 Fishbrain's global data set, among the largest in the world, is selectively provided in a managed and controlled manner to scientific research partners in both North America and Europe to better understand and improve fisheries research
 



  





**Feeling hooked? Throw us a line!**

 Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more . Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.
   

  

**Our Purpose –** 
**Bridging the World Through Travel**
 We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.
   

  

 We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.

 The Security Department oversees security, compliance, GRC, and security operations for all Agoda. We are vigilant in ensuring there is no breach or vulnerability threatening our company or endangering our employees in order to keep Agoda safe and protected. title: Business-minded Enterprise Architect – Stockholm
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting and Design Services
description:
We are currently looking for senior, business-oriented Enterprise Architects for our team. You will work in challenging and meaningful projects, using your expertise to change the way our customers work.
   

  

**We are looking for additional senior Enterprise Architects in our Design & Strategy team – people who want to create an impact that lasts. People who can see things from different angles and with new eyes.**
**Are you a Senior business-minded Enterprise Architect? Are you interested in key business initiatives such as e.g. strategic advisory, facilitating innovation and enabling transformational change? Do you both have a strategic mindset as well as hands-on experience in business and digitalisation improvement projects? If so – then we absolutely need you to join our team!**
 As a Senior Enterprise Architect at Solita you aim to create impact. With Solita’s Design & Strategy team, you design new business changes and strategies in collaboration with our clients’ business stakeholders and other Solitans. You are in a key role defining the business and project goals together with our clients.
   

  

 We’re building a better future for us all
   

  

 Solita Design & Strategy is a multitalented community of more than 150 strategy consultants, designers, enterprise architects and business transformation makers, who are driven by human insights and behaviour. We work with both our Swedish and international clients in their spaces or our communal spaces in northern and central Europe. Together with the rest of Solita’s diverse data and technology experts, we show the direction in which services of the future are designed and built.
   

  

 Solita is a workplace where you will always find a more knowledgeable, multi-disciplinary peer to spar with. People join us to become a part of a diverse community of experienced professionals and continuous learners. And people stay for the same reason. At Solita, you will find an easy-going work culture where you can be yourself no matter who you are. We offer support for our people both in work and also when life happens.
   

  

 What you would get to dig in to
   

  

 Your projects will concentrate on areas such as e.g. structure business strategy, business development, articulate business outcomes, support investment decisions, enable business innovation engagements, design current and target architecture, design and develop strategic plans and/or roadmaps, information architecture, business and/or data solution design, increase the agility and flexibility through enterprise architecture design, design of new eco systems.
   

  

 In this position, you might have a few projects at hand simultaneously, depending on your skillset and wish. There will be a lot of variation, and you will get a unique chance to work with a very experienced and innovative team! Further on, you will also get to specialize in the area of consulting that motivates you the most.
   

  

 What we hope you have in your carry-on;
   

  

 – Relevant educational background
   

  

 – Interest in consultative client work and create impact that lasts
   

  

 – Excellent presentation, moderation and communication skills
   

  

 – Strong analytical thinking skills
   

  

 – Consultative sales experience
   

  

 – Enterprise architecture modeling experience
   

  

 – Fluent Swedish and English language skills (mandatory for this role)
   

  

 What we offer you;
   

  

 – The chance to grow professionally in an international atmosphere
   

  

 – Personal growth, teamwork and learning from real experts in the field
   

  

 – A great group of people to work with, both in the client projects but also for afterworks and lunch runs!
   

  

 – A company that actually cares about your well-being, your development and passions
   

  

 Interested?
   

  

 Are you ready to take the first step towards joining Solita? Solita is a fast-growing Nordic company that works with digital transformation, fueled by data and human expertise. We work with both big and small customers, and have offices in Sweden, Finland, Germany, Estonia, Belgium and Denmark.

title: Hardware Emulator Engineer – ASIC Systems
description:
**We are seeking for a Hardware Emulator Engineer – ASIC Systems. The work is about partitioning in the top-level verification of cutting-edge ASICs that power complex, high-performance systems. Integrated in multi-chip modules are now usually replacing monolithic solutions. Our designs hold several hundreds of processor cores, DSPs as well as ARM cores, and many high-speed interfaces, including Ethernet, CPRI, and PCIe.**


### **Assignment Description**


* Participate in development of software driven tests written in C.
* Development of sequences for UVM VIPs, only required for some of our tests.
* Debug failing test cases using the SystemC/TLM platform, in RTL simulation or the hardware emulator, depending on available platform, type of failure and type of test.
* Contribute to keeping your tests clean in the CI regression running on our four run platforms.
* Potentially, depending on need and interest, compilation and partitioning of designs to run in the hardware emulator.

title: ADAS_Autosar Engineer [F/M/X]
description:
Job description
  
  

You will work at the client site, identifying verification needs for features and functions to define test requirements and create detailed test plans. Your responsibilities include managing, planning, preparing, and executing tests, analyzing results, and providing recommendations in your technology area. Continuously updating test methods and proposing updates to technical requirements will be key, as well as defining strategies and developing test methods for new technologies. You will perform AUTOSAR embedded software integration. Additionally, you will guide customers in the use and integration of Vector embedded products through their lifecycle, including troubleshooting and root cause analysis. Participation in internal, customer, supplier, and OEM meetings is also required.
  
  

Profile Requirement
  
  

Experience with Texas Instruments TDA4 and System-on-Chip (SoC) technology.
  
Background in Advanced Driver Assistance Systems (ADAS).
  
Experience with Python, c++ and embedded c
  
Hands-on experience with vehicle measurement devices.
  
Familiarity with AUTOSAR framework and proven experience in software implementation within AUTOSAR.
  
Strong understanding of automotive electronics and embedded systems.
  
Strong teamwork mindset and problem-solving attitude essential.
  
Excellent communication and collaboration skills
  
Autonomous and self-going.
  
  

Amaris Consulting is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to promoting diversity within the workforce and creating an inclusive working environment. For this purpose, we welcome applications from all qualified candidates regardless of gender, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, beliefs, age, marital status, disability, or other characteristics.
  
  

Who are we?
  
Amaris Consulting is an independent technology consulting firm providing guidance and solutions to businesses. With more than 1000 clients across the globe, we have been rolling out solutions in major projects for over a decade – this is made possible by an international team of 7500 people spread across 5 continents and more than 60 countries. Our solutions focus on four different Business Lines: Information System & Digital, Telecom, Life Sciences and Engineering. We’re focused on building and nurturing a top talent community where all our team members can achieve their full potential. Amaris is your steppingstone to cross rivers of change, meet challenges and achieve all your projects with success.
  
  

At Amaris, we strive to provide our candidates with the best possible recruitment experience. We like to get to know our candidates, challenge them, and be able to give them proper feedback as quickly as possible. Here's what our recruitment process looks like:
  
  

**Brief Call:** Our process typically begins with a brief virtual/phone conversation to get to know you! The objective? Learn about you, understand your motivations, and make sure we have the right job for you!
  
  

Interviews (the average number of interviews is 3 - the number may vary depending on the level of seniority required for the position). During the interviews, you will meet people from our team: your line manager of course, but also other people related to your future role. We will talk in depth about you, your experience, and skills, but also about the position and what will be expected of you. Of course, you will also get to know Amaris: our culture, our roots, our teams, and your career opportunities!
  
  

**Case study:** Depending on the position, we may ask you to take a test. This could be a role play, a technical assessment, a problem-solving scenario, etc.
  
  

As you know, every person is different and so is every role in a company. That is why we have to adapt accordingly, and the process may differ slightly at times. However, please know that we always put ourselves in the candidate's shoes to ensure they have the best possible experience.
  
We look forward to meeting you!
company_description: Amaris Consulting is an independent technology consulting firm providing guidance and solutions to businesses. It gathers more than 7,500 people across 5 continents and more than 60 countries.

title: Global Engineering Manager, Radiopharma (RP)
description:
**Job Description Summary**
===========================


Systems engineering is a cross-functional engineering discipline centered on an approach, mindset, and process. All activities that consider both the business and the technical needs of the customers with the goal of providing a quality product that meets the users needs. The discipline that executes a robust process of design, creation, and optimization of systems, consisting of identification and quantification of system requirements, creation of alternate system design concepts, performance of design trade studies, selection and implementation of the best designs and verification that the design is properly integrated and executed. Process that proceeds from concept to production to operation.
  

Owns/influences budgets and operating plans. The role is guided by operating policy. Works with cross functional teams. The role has autonomy within the operational area or a segment within a larger business unit. The role may have a major impact on a small business unit or Family within a Function or P&L. High levels of evaluative judgment and operational acumen are required to achieve outcomes.**Job Description**
===================

**Job Profile Summary:**
------------------------

  

We are looking for our next Engineering Leader for the Global RadioPharma business segment, part of the Molecular Imaging and Computed Tomography (MICT) Engineering team at GE HealthCare, with operations in Sweden and China. This role leads an engineering team responsible for RadioPharmaceutical Isotope production systems and processing solutions.


These systems and solutions play an increasingly important role in Oncology, Neurology, and Cardiology care pathways, enabling early and precise diagnosis for personalized treatment and therapy guidance. Our products impact the care of millions of patients daily and support cutting-edge medical research. GE HealthCare has been a leader in medical imaging history and continues to define the future of this essential work.


This role oversees all engineering efforts across Field, Factory, and Futures activities for the RadioPharma business segment. Specifically, the leader guides the team responsible for delivering successful Advanced Technology Development (ATD) and New Product Introduction (NPI) programs, meeting key deliverables, driving end-to-end execution, achieving product quality targets, and ensuring business continuity through Supply Chain, Manufacturing, and Service. This leader will work with product management teams, manufacturing, and sourcing to support customers and ensure customer operations uptime, manufacturing continuity, safety, quality, and cost.


This position requires a broad understanding of all products and technologies across the Radiopharma business, guiding the engineering team in solving technical problems in the field or factory, and shaping customer-needs-based and outcomes-driven global technology and innovation roadmaps for future products and solutions. The role demands acting on all matters related to the RadioPharma engineering department and program plans, within the boundaries defined for each program and the overall engineering budget. Participation in the GEHC business process, including World Wide Technology Planning (WWTP), World Wide Product Planning (WWPP), Long Term Strategy (LTS), and Annual Talent Review sessions, is essential.

**Roles and Responsibilities:**
-------------------------------

* Own the complete end-to-end engineering of RadioPharmaceutical Isotope production systems and processing solutions – roadmap, conceptualization, design, implementation, and install base management.
* Manage team stakeholders and priorities; work closely with the RadioPharma Business Segment leader, Product Management, Marketing, Service, and Program Management Office to prioritize engineering activities and define system roadmaps. Clearly communicate complex technical information and progress in an organized, simple, and easy-to-understand manner to both leadership and team members.
* Provide operational management for a global team; manage budgets, milestones, and KPIs for ongoing support and projects. Drive ATD projects for new ideas and innovations. Ensure that engineering teams consider design for manufacturability, install, and service early in the product design cycle. Collaborate with advanced manufacturing engineering and sourcing teams, ensuring their inputs are considered in design.
* Handle the deliverables of a team of 40 to 50 engineers with diverse skills, ensuring that programs are delivered on time with safety and quality requirements through Lean and Design for Six Sigma practices.
* Foster technical leadership and engineering excellence in the core technologies required for these systems and corresponding subsystems. Manage career development and performance processes. Promote the growth of technical experts in these core technologies and ensure the depth and breadth of the team for supporting new designs and installed base quality.
* Coach and mentor the engineering team with end-to-end ownership and accountability. Drive rigor in design controls, design transfer, verification, validation, and acceptance activities to ensure that product, equipment, tools, processes, software, training, and documentation meet requirements.
* Ensure product compliance with Local and Global regulatory guidelines, rules, and standards; GEHC Quality Manual, Quality Management System, Quality Management Policy, Quality Goals, and applicable laws and regulations as they apply to this job type/position.
* Be a key member of the Uppsala site leadership team.
* Develop and maintain program plans with individual program managers/LPIs, including productivity programs.
* Participate in scheduled program reviews. Maintain and communicate appropriate Quality and program metrics.
* Utilize appropriate communication methods and processes at all levels of the organization to promote team goals, progress, and results.
* Adhere to the GEHC Quality System, using the PRD process and the EQPM during the engineering design process.
* Facilitate the protection of IP.
* Provide product quality support.
* Support Environmental Health and Safety (EHS) activities, as required.

**Quality Specific Goals:**
---------------------------

* Be aware of and comply with the GEHC Quality Manual, Quality Management System, Quality Management Policy, Quality Goals, and applicable laws and regulations as they apply to this job type/position.
* Complete all planned Quality & Compliance training within the defined deadlines.
* Identify and report any quality or compliance concerns and take immediate corrective action as required.
* Drive compliance/closure of Regulatory and Quality requirements before approving Design Outputs/Program Deliverables.
* Champion continuous improvement activities by initiating process and product quality improvement initiatives.

**Required Qualifications:**
----------------------------

* Overall industry experience of more than 15 years with 10 years of management and leadership experience.
* Experience in driving a team of diverse expertise in systems, hardware, software, and biological or chemical processing.
* BS in Engineering, Physics, Chemistry or equivalent (defined as a High School Diploma/GED and 20 years relative experience).
* 15 years progressive experience as an engineer or scientist within the appropriate field of study, including 7 years experience in leadership within a manufacturing, development, or research environment.
* Experience in complex systems design, qualification, and support. Extensive experience and functional expertise in quality, reliability, and Lean.
* Strong experience in Stakeholder and Priority management, working closely with Business segment leaders and global teams.
* Demonstrated leadership and project management skills. Strong quantitative and analytical skills.
* Excellent interpersonal, facilitation, and coaching skills.
* Strong written and oral communication skills.
* High level of energy, drive, and enthusiasm.
* Strong process skills and business analysis skills.
* Strong English skills.
* Must be legally authorized to work in Sweden full-time.
* Must be willing to work in our Uppsala facility full-time.

**Desired Characteristics:**
----------------------------

* MS or PhD in Engineering or Physics or equivalent experience.
* Advanced degree in relevant engineering disciplines, such as electronics or high energy physics.
* Experience in relevant complex electronics design, including RadioFrequency (RF) electronic systems.
* Familiar with artificial intelligence and deep learning technologies to either enhance engineering team efficiency or drive product performance.
* Strategic planner and thinker with the ability to drive change across the business, products, and industry.
* Experience driving technology and business planning processes with a focus on differentiation and financial return.
* External focus. Understands the customer and market and is able to translate opportunities into concrete actions.
* Experience with medical/radiopharmacy equipment.
* Proven competency in key business tools such as Change Acceleration (CAP), LEAN, etc.
* Ability to prioritize and drive multiple programs.
* Experience working with academic institutions for advanced research.

**Inclusion and Diversity**
---------------------------


GE HealthCare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.

**Behaviors**
-------------


We expect all employees to live and breathe our behaviors: to act with humility and build trust; lead with transparency; deliver with focus, and drive ownership – always with unyielding integrity.

**Tot****al Rewards**
---------------------


Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.

**Additional Information**
==========================

**Relocation Assistance Provided:** No

title: ADAS_Autosar Engineer [F/M/X]
description:
**Who are we?**
---------------

**Amaris Consulting** is an independent technology consulting firm providing guidance and solutions to businesses. With more than 1,000 clients across the globe, we have been rolling out solutions in major projects for over a decade – this is made possible by an international team of 7,600 people spread across 5 continents and more than 60 countries. Our solutions focus on four different Business Lines: Information System & Digital, Telecom, Life Sciences and Engineering. We’re focused on building and nurturing a top talent community where all our team members can achieve their full potential. Amaris is your steppingstone to cross rivers of change, meet challenges and achieve all your projects with success.  

  

At Amaris, we strive to provide our candidates with the best possible recruitment experience. We like to get to know our candidates, challenge them, and be able to give them proper feedback as quickly as possible. Here's what our recruitment process looks like:
  

  

**Brief Call**: Our process typically begins with a brief virtual/phone conversation to get to know you! The objective? Learn about you, understand your motivations, and make sure we have the right job for you!
  

  

**Interviews** (the average number of interviews is 3 - the number may vary depending on the level of seniority required for the position). During the interviews, you will meet people from our team: your line manager of course, but also other people related to your future role. We will talk in depth about you, your experience, and skills, but also about the position and what will be expected of you. Of course, you will also get to know Amaris: our culture, our roots, our teams, and your career opportunities!
  

  

**Case study**: Depending on the position, we may ask you to take a test. This could be a role play, a technical assessment, a problem-solving scenario, etc.
  

  

As you know, every person is different and so is every role in a company. That is why we have to adapt accordingly, and the process may differ slightly at times. However, please know that we always put ourselves in the candidate's shoes to ensure they have the best possible experience.
  

We look forward to meeting you!
**Job description**
-------------------

You will work at the client site, identifying verification needs for features and functions to define test requirements and create detailed test plans. Your responsibilities include managing, planning, preparing, and executing tests, analyzing results, and providing recommendations in your technology area. Continuously updating test methods and proposing updates to technical requirements will be key, as well as defining strategies and developing test methods for new technologies. You will perform AUTOSAR embedded software integration. Additionally, you will guide customers in the use and integration of Vector embedded products through their lifecycle, including troubleshooting and root cause analysis. Participation in internal, customer, supplier, and OEM meetings is also required.


**Profile Requirement**


* Experience with Texas Instruments TDA4 and System-on-Chip (SoC) technology.
* Background in Advanced Driver Assistance Systems (ADAS).
* Experience with Python, c++ and embedded c
* Hands-on experience with vehicle measurement devices.
* Familiarity with AUTOSAR framework and proven experience in software implementation within AUTOSAR.
* Strong understanding of automotive electronics and embedded systems.
* Strong teamwork mindset and problem-solving attitude essential.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills
* Autonomous and self-going.

  


*Amaris Consulting is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to promoting diversity within the workforce and creating an inclusive working environment. For this purpose, we welcome applications from all qualified candidates regardless of gender, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, beliefs, age, marital status, disability, or other characteristics.*
